Content_1: فیلم اگزما در مورد رویا است که گذشته مبهمی دارد و نمیخواهد همسرش از گذشته اش چیزی بفهمد و سعی میکند زندگی خود را در آرامش نگه دارد ولی در این راه با مشکلات زیادی روبرو می شود....
Content_2: Roya is trying to stay in control of her life whilst she keeps her past secret from her husband...

Content_1: آدمایی که میرن تو خط کج دیگه نمی تونن عشقو تو قاب پنجره چوبی ببینن! قابل توجه اونایی که عادت دارن زود به زود قاب عینکشونو عوض کنن

Content_2: Akram, a girl of 16 years of age, decides to maintain her family's unity despite the death of her drug addict father and her mother's inability to look after her three children. On the way to do so, she turns into a mature woman. Deeply affecting, 'Red Nail Polish' is a beautiful female coming-of-age story.The girl has painted her fingers just when the life paints her face.

Content_1: این شب پایانی ندارد. شبی که روی بام تهران فرود آمده و حلقوم شهر را چسبیده است تا صبح فقط یک شب مانده

داستان این قسمت ۵ سال بعد از اتفاقات قسمت اول رخ می دهد که حسن و عباس از زندان آزاد می شوند و عطا هم از کما بیرون می آید زنده می ماند و گروه قدیمی دوباره تشکیل می شوند. عباس و حسن و عطا مدتی نیز دنبال کار می گردند اما موفق نمی شوند و تصمیم می گیرند مسیر گذشته اشان را پیش ببرند و اتفاقات گشت ارشاد ۲ از همین جا آغاز می شود.
Content_2: The story happens five years after the events of first part after Hassan and Abbas's releasing from the jail. Ata came back to life from coma and the old group reunited again. They are looking for a job but when they can't find any, they decide to do what they did before and the events of The Patrol 2 starts from here.

Content_1: فیلم درکولا با بازی رضا عطاران، ویشکا آسایش و سیامک انصاری داستان فردی از یک خانواده خون آشام است که بعد از جنگ جهانی دوم به ایران مهاجرت کرده و به جای نوشیدن خون به مواد معتاد شده است....
Content_2: 'Dracula', as the title suggests, is a horror movie that blends comedy and vampire stories. The film charts the adventures of an Iranian vampire played by director and actor Reza Attaran.

Content_1: کریم عبدی در آخرین روزهای خدمت سربازی درگیر پدر پیر خود می‌شود که به‌شدت به بیماری آلزایمر دچار است و این تقابل برای نگه‌داشتن پدر در شهری که خود غریبه است و تلاش برای انسان بودن و پایبندی به اعتقادات تاآخرین‌نفس حتی در بدترین شرایط هسته اصلی قصه فیلم «اجباری» را تشکیل می‌دهد.
Content_2: In the last days of his military service, Karim Abdi gets involved with his old father, who has severe Alzheimer's disease and puts Karim in a complicated situation.
The movie is about a young rural man who migrates to Tehran trying to provide for his daily life during the drought period. He has to take on jobs without any previous knowledge or experience...

A little girl is born at the start of the Iran-Iraq war. When she is blowing out the candle on her birthday cake, a bomb falls on her house and kills her parents. She shaves her head and changes her identity, but enduring the war makes a lady out of her. A complete, great and memorable lady.

Content_1: فیلم حقه باز دم دراز درباره عروسک های عمو پیرداد است که از خانه فرار می کنند و مشکلات زیادی را به وجود می آورند.
طوبي: امشب عروسي اميرحسينِ ، دوتامون خوشحاليم ...من نبايد اون حر‌ف‌ها رو مي‌زدم، فقط بهم بگو چرا چهار بار چشمت و بازبسته کردي ... منظور خاصي داشتي ميثم؟
Content_2: This film charts the story of Tooba, her love and dedication to her war-disabled and paralyzed husband. He has even lost his speech ability. At the wedding night of his nephew, when the children leave to attend the ceremony, he feels worse and passes away within a few hours...Tuba: Tonight is Amir Hossein’s wedding; we both are happy ... I shouldn’t have said those things; just tell me why you opened and closed your eyes four times? ... Did you mean something Meysam?

Content_1: تئاتر باغ آلبالو داستان یک زن اشراف زاده روس و خانواده اش است که به علت قرض، رو به ورشکستگی هستند و باغ آلبالوی خاطره انگیزشان در گرو بانک است، و چون خانواده غیر از قرض عایداتی ندارد، قرار است در موعد معینی باغ و ملکشان حراج شود. درعین حال...
یک معلم ریاضی برای تدریس خصوصی به خانه شاگردش می رود و همین امر باعث آشنایی او با مادر بچه می شود...
Content_2: A mathematics teacher meets with his student`s mother.

Content_1: مردی به خاطر بیماری در آستانه مرگ قرار گرفته است و در این بین همسر و مادرش در چالشی با هم قرار می گیرد که زندگی همه خانواده را سخت و صعب تر می نماید...
Content_2: A young man suffering from cancer is spending his last days of life. In this difficult circumstance, a rivalry occurs between his mother and his wife.  Unfortunately the director passed away because of cancer just a couple of months after finishing the film.A modern and romantic melodrama that tells the story of a young couple. The man is at the end of his life because of cancer and this creates a competition between his mother and his wife.

Content_1: یونس جانباز اعصاب و روان، حالا بیست و هفت سال پس از پایان جنگ هنوز هم با خاطره هم رزمانش روزگار می گذراند. همراه شدن او با یک گروه تفحص اما اتفاقات تازه ای را در این جریان سیال ذهن وارد می کند.
Content_2: A group of close friends fighting for their country during Iran-Iraq war were all martyred, except for one who has not been in peace for 30 years as his friends’ bodies remained unfound. Yet, he has promised their families that he will find them and goes on a trip, looking for their bodies.
Ghodrat who's desperately looking to marry, is introduced - by his friend Touraj- to dating sites in order to find the right match...

Content_1: زوجی میخواهند مهاجرت کنند ولی یک سری اتفاقاتی برایشان میفتد که باعث میشود زندگیشان کاملا دچار تغییر شود . زن وقتی میخواهد بیرون برود در راه لپ تاپش را دزدیده شده و باعث می شود که مشکلات بسیاری برایش پیش بیاید...
Content_2: A famous actor and his fiancée are in the process of immigrating to another country. However, after his backpack is stolen, they postpone their trip. Together they try their best to resolve the different obstacles facing them.A couple is going to emigrate when faced with a new problem. Now they must do anything they can to solve it….

Content_1: سایه در آستانه تولد سی سالگی اش، در دل ِ تهران ِ امروز به دنبال رویایش می رود؛ رویای مادر شدن.
Content_2: Sayeh is looking for her life long dream in the midst of becoming 30; to become a mother...

Content_1: خرج عروسی بیشتره یا عزا، برای اینکه هزینه ها بالا نره بهتره که عروسی رو تو عزا گرفت که خرجش کمتر شه…
Content_2: What's more pricey? A wedding or a funeral? To cut down on the costs it's best to have the wedding at the funeral!...

Content_1: فیلم گاهی ، داستان سه زوج ایرانی است که در پایان حضور خود در یک مهمانی با تراژدی روبرو می شوند و...
Content_2: Three couples who have been friends for a long time have been invited to a banquet arranged by one of them to surprise the others. The surprise turns into a tragedy and…

Content_1: فیلم خنده های آتوسا داستان مسافران یک قطار است که از تهران به سمت استانبول در حرکت است. هریک از مسافران دلایل خود را برای این سفر دارند و قصه خود را دنبال می کنند و....
Content_2: The story takes place on a train from Iran to Istanbul. Majan, a girl with a bag full of money and embezzlement documents, Moosa, a man searching for his lost sister, Atoosa, a beautiful fame fatal, Dr.Taheri, the trains physician and finally a tourist couple are all the passengers of this train. The bag is lost ...

Content_1: .مستوفی که از انجام امور زندگی بازمانده در پی شخصی مورد اعتماد است تا انجام این امور را به او محول کند
Content_2: The story of a man (Mostofi) who lost his memory. He who struggles to manage his work related issues tries to find someone trustworthy who can take over.

Content_1: فیلم کمدی ساعت پنج عصر ساخته مهران مدیری یک فیلم خیابانی و بسیار شلوغ پر ازدحام است که معضلات روزمره اجتماعی و فرهنگی ما را نشان میدهد. فیلم از ساعت هفت صبح تا پنج بعدازظهر زندگی یک وکیل را نشان میدهد که به تنهایی در شمال تهران زندگی میکند و باید برای پرداخت قسط بانکی راس ساعت پنج خود را در شعبه بانک باشد تا خانه اش را از مصادره شدن توسط بانک نجات دهد. ولی ....
Content_2: Mehrdad Parham is an attorney who has to make a mortgage payment before 5 PM to save his home.

Content_1: فیلم داستان دختری جوان به نام توکا است که برای پیدا کردن نامزدش به تهران می آید ولی متوجه اتفاقاتی در مورد نامزدش در تهران میشود که توقع آن را ندارد....
Content_2: It is the story of a young girl who comes to Tehran to find her fiancé and faces some harshness that she was not expecting.

Content_1: فیلم مستند آی آدمها به کارگردانی رخشان بنی اعتماد درمورد گروه پزشکان داوطلب ایرانی و فرانسوی از طریق موسسه خیریه زنجیره امیداست که بچه های بیمار و محروم را از سراسر ایران در سه رشته قلب، ارتوپدی و ترمیمی در بالاترین سطح استاندارد، درمان می کنند.
Content_2: Through the charity organization, "Chain of Hope", a team of volunteer Iranian and French medical doctors treat underprivileged child patients from all over Iran in three branches of cardiac, orthopedics and rehabilitation to the highest standards. Website: karafilm.ir

Content_1: فیلم هیهات یک فیلم اپیزودی و با موضوعات اجتماعی و مفاهیم عاشورایی است...
Content_2: This episodic film is comprised of four stories, each sharing the central theme of Imam Hussein. A son must do whatever it takes to honor his mother’s dying wish of pilgrimage to Karbala, a war veteran cancels his pilgrimage plans to save his community, a wife searches for her husband who has been defending the holy shrine from terrorists, and a poor paternal orphan learns that the Imam is the only person worthy of pleading to...

Content_1: فیلم خشم و هیاهو به کارگردانی هومن سیدی و با بازی نوید محمدزاده و طناز طباطبایی داستان خواننده ای است که پس از آشنایی با زنی جوان از طرفدارنش زندگیش درگیر مسائل پیچیده ای می شود....
Content_2: ‘Sound and Fury’ depicts the life of Khosro, a pop singer, who lives a hectic life with his wife Tina and his son. His life is further complicated when he becomes involved with a female fan. A terrible event then forces each to recount their side of the story in the pursuit of the truth.

Content_1: داستان فردی به نام ریان است که بنا به دلایلی به سفری می رود که در این سفر با ماجراهای زیادی روبرو می شود و در نهایت به شهر «مرو» می رسد...
Content_2: IN THE PATH OF RAIN (3D Animation Film), tells the story of the difficult life conditions of Rayan, a man who is extremely aggravated and suffering by the drought who has made life difficult for him and his family. Rayan leaves home and starts a new journey with his old friend Hormouz. However, this new journey is full of new adventures…

Content_1: در یک مراسم عروسی کودکان را به محل برگزاری جشن راه نمی دهند و به کلبه ای در انتهای باغ تبعید می کنند. بچه ها متوجه می شوند برگزارکنندگان مراسم قاچاقچی مواد مخدر هستند، لذا تصمیم می گیرند تا جشن را به هم بزنند و این آغاز ماجراست...
Content_2: Children are not allowed to attend a wedding reception and they are sent to a cottage at the end of the garden. The children find out that the hosts are drug dealers so they decide to disrupt the wedding ceremony and then the adventures begin…

EN_title: There Will Be Blood On Wednesday
Content_2: When Arash finds out that his brother will be executed soon, he decides to prepare a hold-up with the help of his sister and friends. One day, the group of friends take staff and customers hostage in an bureau de change. Arash and his friends will only free the people taken hostage, if his brother gets released from jail.Be careful not to fall in love with me, you might not survive the night.

Directed by Majid Tavakkoli, this romantic drama tells the story of dreams and ambitions for a generation of young Iranians who often find those things difficult to come by. In this unique take on a familiar theme, a young couple assume the role of a much wealthier couple in order to spend their days with Tehran’s nouveau riche. The adventure begins with playful games that take the audience on a comic ride but it ends in horror when the young couple find themselves locked up in an apartment, facing a case of mistaken identities. At once twisted, unpredictable, funny and thrilling, Tavakkoli’s film is a masterful, beautifully acted, cleverly composed exercise in building suspense.A young boy and girl like to experience the life of the wealthy. They are playing a game that they consider harmless and just do it to joke with people. They pretend to be a wealthy young couple and are looking for an expensive home to live in. With the guidance of a realtor, the young couple enter a noble’s home at the wealthy part of the city and a middle-aged couple show them the house. Meanwhile, an unexpected skepticism happens that changes everyone’s places and the young couple feel that everything has become serious and even dangerous.

Content_1: داستان فیلم آااادت نمی کنیم با بازی محمدرضا فروتن و هدیه تهرانی درمورد احمدرضا مقدم ، استاد معروف و با سابقه دانشگاه است که شک و تردیدهای همسرش نسبت به ارتباط او با یکی از دانشجویانش منجر به دردسر و درگیری در زندگیش می شود...
Content_2: The volatile Mahtab (Sareh Bayat) suspects her husband Ahmad (Mohammad Reza Foroutan) is having an affair with his student Farnoosh. After being tipped off by close family friend Sima (Hediyeh Tehrani) she angrily confronts her at the University where he works. However, when Farnoosh dies truths are exposed and events become increasingly complex as Sima and her husband Mansoor are inexorably immersed in the tragic situation. Themes of deception and its consequences underline this bellicose drama, with fine performances and an unnerving score that contribute to a relentlessly tense atmosphere.Ahmadreza Moghadam is an outstanding university professor with many years of teaching under his belt whose wife, Mahtab, is suspicious of his relationship with one of his students. This leads to an unexpected disaster.

Content_1: در فیلم در مدت معلوم ، میثم جوانی است که کتابی منتشر نشده در ارتباط با ازدواج موقت و فشارهای جنسی جوانان دارد و سعی دارد از طریق راه حلی که فکر می کند صحیح است، معضلات مشکلات اجتماعی جوانانی که تحت فشار هستند را برطرف سازد اما....
Content_2: Meysam, a young aspiring writer, is working on a book about the problems faced by young people in contemporary Iranian society. Near the top of the list is the issue sexual desire and frustration: how to wait until marriage? The controversial legal loophole of temporary marriage comes up as a solution, but in his often comical journey of research, Meysam explores whether it is really ideal. A rare attempt at shining at comical light on some often ignored aspects of modern Iran.

EN_title: I Am Just a Poet, Officer
Content_2: An intimist documentary on Iranian songwriter and poet Yaghma Golrouee. Alternating performance footage, poetic digressions and interviews with the poet, the film explores Iranian music and songwriting through the years, chiefly socio-political songs before and after the revolution. In 'I Am Just a Poet, Officer', Golrouee highlights the importance of poetry in politically engaged music, largelly stemming from the work of seminal Persian poets such as Abu Abdollah Jafar ibn Mohammad Rudaki. Golrouee also discusses and criticizes the content and imagery of Iranian pop music.

Content_1: فیلم کوچه بی نام به کارگردانی هاتف علیمردانی و بازی فرهاد اصلانی و باران کوثری در مورد دو خانواده در جنوب شهر تهران است که درگیر یک سری اتفاقات می شوند....
Content_2: Two families live in the same impoverished neighbourhood but their differing outlooks on life brings them many difficulties. Mehdi lives with his devoutly religious wife and three daughters. In the same building, lives Farzaneh who has lost her husband. She lives with her son and a baby girl. The narrative unpacks the lives of these two families, highlighting the generation gap in Iran and the struggle between tradition and modernity.This film is about two traditional families who live in an old house. The young son is supposed to go to Khorramshahr for work. Haj Ahmed, his uncle, gets him a plane ticket and the day after they find out that the plane has crashed and this is the start of challenges for these two families.

Content_1: فیلم سلام بمبئی ملودرامی عاشقانه با بازی محمد رضا گلزار که در هند تهیه شده و داستان آشنایی یک دختر هندی و یک پسر ایرانی است که هر دو دانشجوی پزشکی هستند. پس از اینکه پسر دختر را از خودکشی نجات میدهد درگیر اتفاقات پیچیده ای می شوند که...
Content_2: Ali is an Iranian exchange student from Iran who is studying medicine as a cardio resident in Mumbai. By chance, he saves the life of one of his classmates Karishma, who has attempted suicide. Little by little he tries to talk to Karishma and give her hope and happiness, which eventually leads to the two of them falling in love.

Content_1: داستان پیرمرد کارخانه داری به نام حبیب (رضا کیانیان) است که بتازگی مبتلا به بیماری آلزایمر شده است. این بیماری دردها و رنج های زیادی برای وی به ارمغان می آورد طوری که خانواده اش منجمله همسرش پریناز (رویا نونهالی) او را ترک می کنند! اما با بازگشت دخترش به ایران اتفاقاتی رخ می دهد که…
Content_2: Kiumars Pourahmad's latest drama 'Where Are My Shoes?' is a movie adaptation of the American author Lisa Genova's debut novel 'Still Alice'. The film charts Habib Kaveh (Reza Kianian), an elderly man and factory owner who suffers from Alzheimer's disease. Years after Habib has been abandoned by his family, his life is turned upside down and her daughter decides to come back to Iran to reconnect with him. Will his disease bring their relationship back on track? Reza Kianian delivers a powerful and endearing performance in this poignant and relatable story where family relationships are put to test.Habib Kaveh is an old factory owner who starts losing his memories to Alzheimer’s disease. His family has left him but the return of his daughter to Iran leads to a series of events.

Content_1: فیلم آب نبات چوبی مسائل جوانان و مشکلات تفاوت نسلی را بررسی می کند. اختلاف دیدگاه نسل قدیم و جدید درباره مشکلات خانواده و تاثیر جامعه بر جوانان امروزی محور اصلی این فیلم است....
Content_2: Lollipop revolves around the disappearance of Maral. Initially it is assumed that she had run off to Turkey, with an unknown boyfriend, but as more time passes, her mother, sister, brother and brother-in-law, Morteza and Farhad, naturally become increasingly concerned. Eventually Morteza and Farhad begin to scour Tehran in search of Maral. As their search continues in failing to produce any concrete leads, her mother becomes steadily convinced the worst has happened as the discoveries they make become progressively more disturbing.

Omid happily celebrates his birthday with his wife and her family at a beautiful villa near the Caspian Sea. A phone call from Omid's ex-wife puts the festivities on hold as she drops a bombshell that threatens to unravel the new life he is trying to lead. Written by Iranian playwright Mohammad Yaghoubi, this insightful drama tackles marital and social issues with sharp dialogue and knowing humor.Omid along with his wife Ala and his brother-in-law Arash are at a party. Mitra, Omid’s former wife, contacts him and says that she needs his help. Omid makes plans with her and other things happen later.

Content_1: یتیم خانه ایران، داستان سال های 1295 تا1300 را روایت می کند.سال های حکومت احمد شاه قاجار، در کوران جنگ جهانی اول و اشغال ایران به دست روس و انگلیس که به دلیل قحطی و خشکسالی تعداد زیادی از مردم ایران جان باختند.
Content_2: A documentary film about the incidents that occurred to different groups of people in the years 1917 till 1920.

Madcap fantasy comedy following a young man's adventures following the death of his father. Hilarity ensues when the man and his friend find a genie in a bottle. Charming comedy blurring the lines between fantasy and reality.Penniless "Hassan" is on the path of getting his late father’s money from con artist "Malek Solomon". He is put in a fantasy setting and is turned into an imaginary person, but his love for Malek Solomon’s daughter stops him from continuing his mission.

The strict and traditional Mr. Azizi leads an uneventful family life in an oil town of southern Iran. Then one day, exasperated by her father’s authoritarianism, Setareh announces she is off to Tehran to say farewell to one of her best friends who is leaving Iran for good. Unfortunately, the engagement celebrations of Setareh’s younger sister are taking place simultaneously.Despite her father’s objections, Setareh takes the plane for Tehran. This act of disobedience sets in motion a series of perturbations that upset the calm tranquility of the paterfamilias.Mr. Azizi is the supervisor of the repairs and maintenance section of Abadan’s refinery and is getting ready for her daughter suitor to ask permission to marry her. Setareh, his other daughter, is planning to travel to Tehran on the same day she said that she needs to attend the goodbye party of a university friend. Her father is suspicious of this trip for some reason and this is the start of the story.

Naser is on a holiday in Brazil with his family. He does not suspect yet but the family vacation that started out so peacefully is about to take a huge twist. First, he is taken by mistake as the former boyfriend of Angela, a local girl from a rich family. She gets him involved in a deal in order to earn her grandmother's inheritance who is also visiting Brazil. This creates an unstoppable flow of events making things only more complicated. Next to the beautiful setting, this light-hearted comedy offers a great time for the whole family.Nasser and his family go to Brazil through a travel agency for a dreamy and tourist trip. Angel, a Brazilian girl, mistakes him for her former fiancé.

EN_title: Mansour Nariman, the Father of Iranian Oud
Content_2: Director Shahram Mirseraji pays tribute to researcher, writer and Oud player Mansour Namiran (1935 - 2015), the Father of Iranian Oud. The feature length documentary uncovers Namiran's life and passion for the pear-shaped stringed instrument. Eskandar Ebrahimi Zanjani known as Mansour Nariman was born in Mashhad in a family who loved music. Nariman's father played the Tar, Ney and Setar. In 1962 he began to instruct in Tehran conservatory and trained many musicians of later generations of Persian music. The father of Modern Oud has also written several books on the Oud as well. Mirseraji's 2016 documentary film features big-name artists of the Iranian music scene like Ney player Hassan Nahid and Oud players Mohammad Firouzi, Hossein Behroozinia, Ali Pajooheshgar, Negar Bouban, and Majid Nazempour.

Ranna is a seven-year-old girl who lives in a village located in north of Iran; she owns a special hen, Kakoli, which is a commemorative from his grandmother. She affectionately loves it. Meanwhile, Kakoli is hunted by a jackal. She gets too depressed and becomes dumb. Rahman, her brother, decides to put the eggs under the other hens but he doesn't know that his mother has sold the eggs to a peddler. He tends to find the painted eggs and ...Rana is a seven years old girl who lives in one of the villages in northern Iran. She has a special chicken named Kakoli which is a gift from her late grandmother. Rana loves the chicken very much. When the chicken lays eggs, Rana draws baby chicks on the eggs with her color pencils. She has a 12 years old brother named Rahman. They gather the chicken’s eggs so that they can have a chick just like Kakoli, until one night Kakoli is hunted by a jackal and Rana becomes mute and depressed. Rahman decides to put Kakoli’s eggs under another chicken so that they become chicks, but his mother has sold the eggs. Rahman goes to the farmers market to find the colored eggs and help Rana become better but…

Content_1: داستان سارا و پسرش امیر است که در میان کوه‌های خشک و خشن زندگی می‌کنند و برای حفظ معدن زغال سنگ خود با موانع و سختی‌هایی مواجه می‌شوند.
Content_2: Amir is 8 years old. He has lost his father and lives with his mother in a hill far from their village. They have a small coal mine and are struggling to be completely independent. But, the owner of a big mine in that area is trying to take control of the whole mountain. Amirâ€™s mother dies in the mine and the villageâ€™s council decides to bring Amir, who is living in the mountain all by himself now, back to the village. But he resists strongly against their decision since he wants to realize his motherâ€™s intentions and wishes.

Content_1: فیلم ایرانی محمد رسول الله ساخته مجید مجیدی داستان زندگی پیامبر اسلام و بشارت آمدن پیامبری در ادیان دیگر از زمان قبل از تولد پیامبر و دوران جاهلیت تا 12 سالگی پیامبر است....
Content_2: By the order of Abraha, King of Habasha, one of his army commanders launches an attack on Mecca in order to destroy the Kaaba. He leads a well-equipped force of thousands of soldiers, horses and elephants. As the army approaches Mecca, the elephants respond to divine order by halting and refusing to continue. Millions of small birds then release a hail of stones onto Abraha’s forces and the army is annihilated. A month later, Muhammad is born. This film depicts the pagan age with all its tyranny and oppression as seen through the eyes of Muhammad from birth to the age of 13.

Content_1: فیلم سینمایی تیک آف به کارگردانی احسان عبدی پور، داستان جشنی شبانه است که در پایان جشن، زندگی چهار دختر و پسر تغییر می کند. هیجان، شوخی شوخی و بازی بازی، راه می افتند تا سر از عقده های چند ساله خود باز کنند. شوخی تا سرحد جنون، هر شرطی به جز مرگ...
Content_2: Faez, Masih, Atena and Hamzeh are spending boring and hopeless days in their thirties. Shirzad who has spent last five years working a ship, returns unexpectedly on a French ship and changes the rhythm of their lives. When they open their eyes, they see themselves in a strange game. Now they want to enjoy life and forget about the difficult times...

Content_1: داستان چند جوانی هست که آس و پاس هستند و در آرزوی پولدار شدن و میخواهند راه چند ساله رو یک شبه بروند و دست به یک سرقت بی نقص از طلا فروشی میزنند، ولی در پایان هر کدام دنبال حذف کردن دیگری میشوند
Content_2: A group of young people plan the perfect robbery, but along the way, they fall out with one another.

Content_1: فیلم دو با بازی پرویز پرستویی و مهتاب نصیر پور داستان بهمن سپهری است که بعد از سال ها از آلمان به ایران می آید تا املاکش را بفروشد، و کارهای انحصار وراثت را انجام بدهد و دوباره به آلمان برگردد. پری خدمتکاری ست که وارد خانه ی بهمن می شود تا برای مدتی که او می خواهد کارهایش را انجام بدهد، زندگی پری هم از سوی دیگر بهم ریخته است و .....زني براي کار کردن بعنوان خدمتکار وارد زندگي مردي مي‌شود که براي فروختن خانه پدري خود از خارج کشور بازگشته است و داستان زندگي اين دو نفر بصورت موازي با هم روايت مي شود و مشکلات زندگي آنها به تصوير کشيده مي‌شود.
Content_2: A woman comes to work as a housekeeper and enters a man’s life who has returned from abroad in order to sell his father’s house. Their story is told alongside each other and their issues are shown on the screens...A woman comes to work as a housekeeper and enters a man’s life who has returned from abroad in order to sell his father’s house. Their story is told alongside each other and their issues are shown on the screens.

Content_1: رامین، جسد پدرش را که فوت شده به قبرستانی که او وصیت کرده می برد و در آنجا متوجه می شود که قبر پدرش میلیون ها تومان ارزش دارد و وسوسه می شود تا قبر را بفروشد! او برای پیدا کردن محلی برای دفن پدرش دچار مشکل می شود.
Content_2: Young slacker Ramin’s father has just passed away. Responsibility falls on Ramin to carry out his late father’s burial requests, as mentioned in the will. However, when Ramin arrives at the cemetery, he is astonished to discover that the grave is worth an extraordinary sum of money. Will Ramin succumb to temptation at the price of his father’s honor? With a catchy soundtrack, well-crafted title sequences and quirky performances, this black comedy provides a refreshing take on dealing with loss.

'Bedridden' recounts the story of a woman who leaves her hometown with her child after getting a divorce, But her ex-husband leaves no stone unturned, to block her private and new career.Is Tehran yours?

Arjang (Reza Attaran), who was born before the revolution in Iran, has been in love with his childhood sweetheart, Roya (Mahnaz Afshar), for the past 40 years. Roya, however, has brought him nothing but trouble. Now 50, and having experienced a revolution, a war, a divorce and both poverty and wealth, Arjang finds himself still in love with Roya.Arjang Senobar is a fifty years old man who tells the story of his different and complicated experiences in love and the problems he faces in his life.

Content_1: در فیلم مذاکرات مستقیم با آقای عبدی ، آقای عبدی بازیگر مطرح سینما توسط یک آدم ربا ربوده شده و در مکانی زندانی است. آدم ربا برای آزادی او درخواست یک میلیون دلار پول می کند. آقای عبدی برای تهیه پول به مسئولان مملکتی و وزرای دولت تلفن می زند و…

Content_2: The story of four kids who are after some smugglers in order to save their parents company from closure.Some young children whose fathers work at a stationary factory decide to stand up to the smugglers of stationary products and prevent the factory from going down...
Nahid follows her husband on the street of Tehran to discover his secret...After an accident, sunk in the everyday life, Nahid finds out that there are too many secrets in her husband’s life…

Content_1: خط آبی داستان فیلم درباره دختری است که به دلیل قضاوت اشتباه یک قاضی، در صدد انتقام از پسر او بر می‌آید و در این مسیر اتفاقاتی روی می‌دهد.
Content_2: A girl decides to take revenge on a judge for his unjust order by killing his son but other things get in the way...

Content_1: پس از مرگ مادربزرگ خانواده، زن و شوهری که چندین سال از جدایی شان می گذرد، برای بهتر شدن حال روحی دخترشان به سفر می روند و ...
Content_2: Sahar, whose parents are divorced, faces mental problems following the death of her grandmother and her parents must take her to a short journey. During this journey, the reason behind their divorce is revealed. Sahar has to choose one of them now to live with...

Content_1: فیلم خانه دختر با بازی باران کوثری ، حامد بهداد و پگاه آهنگرانی داستان دختری به نام سمیرا است که در روز ازدواجش می میرد و به نظر می آید خودکشی کرده است همه خانواده وی به هم می ریزد در حالی همسر و دوستان وی تلاشند که بدانند آیا او خودکشی کرده است و چرا؟....
Content_2: Tomorrow is Samira's wedding ceremony and Bahar and Parisa are shopping excitedly. But at night somebody calls and tells them that the bride is dead and the wedding has been called off. They are both shocked and they cannot believe what they have heard, so they go straight to their friend's fiancé, Mansoor, to find out about the cause of her suspicious death.

During the war between Iraq and Iran, Saddam Hussein's forces attacked Halabja, a city in Iraqi Kurdistan, with bombs, artillery fire and chemical weapons, in particular nerve gas. Some 5000 people are estimated to have died in the attack. An Iranian war photographer is the first man to enter the city following the massacre. There he meets a woman and a tale of love begins…The story is about a war photographer who is the first person to enter Halabcheh after the chemical bombing and takes photos. This photographer meets a woman during his journey who has lost the boy she was supposed to marry and is now in shock. Ali shows his love for her and gets her to be hopeful toward the future and they marry each other. Now, they have a good life in Iran. Meanwhile, Chiman realizes that her former lover was not killed in the bombing at all and is still alive and has returned. Chiman decides to divorce Ali in order to free herself from guilt, but does not return to her former lover and instead chooses to live alone till Ali comes after her again after fifteen years.

Content_1: منوچهر کارمند بازنشسته اداره دخانیات که هیچوقت ازدواج نکرده، برای یافتن دوست قدیمی اش از شمال به تهران می آید.او در این سفر با دختر و پسری جوان و متفاوت آشنا میشود که آنها تجربیاتی عجیب را ظرف چند روز برایش رقم میزنند...
Content_2: An elderly bachelor is struggling to adapt to a life of retirement, and still occasionally shows up at the cigarette factory he worked at for 30 years. The old man smokes marijuana every day. He longs to escape his mundane small town existence. An unfortunate event leads to his travel to Tehran. Here, he meets two intriguing characters. The three soon bond and become a somewhat unlikely trio. Subtle humor characterizes Behtash Sanaeeha’s wonderfully balanced directorial debut.The story is about an old man named Monfared who has been living alone for years and is retired. He is struggling with his routine life and loneliness and his attempts to regain his old job have proven futile. Until one day he decides to go to the city and meet his old friend whom he has not seen for about thirty years. He stays at a hotel and meets a girl there. Their relationship leads to a new friendship and this changes his view of life.

Content_1: يک فيلم اپيزوديک با 4 داستان که از شب تا صبح روايت مي‌شود و بحران‌هاي زندگي اين شخصيت ها را که هر کدام در موقعيتي قرار گرفته اند را به تصوير مي کشد.فیلم داره صبح میشه به کارگردانی یلدا جبلی داستان چهار خانواده را از شب تا صبح روایت میکند که زندگی آنها به هم ربط هایی دارد....
Content_2: An episodic film made of four separate stories that are happening from night till morning and shows the problems the different characters are dealing with...

A taxi driver tries to make sense of his own life by the stories told to him by his passengers.The story of humans is woven together till the missing pieces of your life’s puzzle is found. That there is a destination and you sometimes have to take an exclusive taxi to reach the end of the road, I wish the end of this road to be the beginning of a story and not the end of all the tales.

Pouria is a loyal soldier finishing the final days of his military service. When a girl who had ran away from her family gets arrested, Pouria decides to help the girl as he likes her. As a result, he disobeys the orders of his superiors, one of whom he had a close, paternal relationship with, and runs away with the girl...It is the story of a soldier following the days at the end of his service and the problems he faces on the road. He does something against the orders of his supervisor. A supervisor whom he has a close and fatherly relationship with…

Content_1: فیلم ایران برگر یکی از کمدی های پرفروش این سالها ساخته مسعود جعفری جوزانی به طور طنز به مقوله انتخابات و وعده های انتخاباتی می پردازد و داستان روستایی را روایت میکند که در آن امرالله خان و فتح الله خان در انتخابات شورا با هم رقابت می کنند...
Content_2: This film is about a fictional village in Iran and two candidates that are competing for people's votes in a local election.

Content_1: مجرد 40 ساله، زندگی خانم دکتری ۴۰ ساله را روایت می کند که در رشته خود دارد، اما در زمینه ازدواج و انتخاب همسر دچار مشکل است و در طول داستان اتفاقاتی برای او رخ می دهد.
Content_2: A 40-year-old doctor who is finding it difficult to find the right match and she faces challenges that changes her opinion...

Nazanin, who needs money, lends her necklace to the middle aged antique shop owner and receives money for it. After a few days, the antique shop owner falls in love with Nazanin and this is the beginning of an unusual love.Nazanin: It is not important who you are or what you do ... Whatever condition you might have, kindness is your responsibility Farhad: It is a good advice, but it has gotten a bit old.

The film is about two brothers who have to spend some time together. One of the brothers suffers bipolar disorder and stays at his brother’s house for a while. The story is around the annotations and events happening for this family, which are caused by that stay.Khosrow has the bipolar disorder, and because of his situation, he has to stay for a while in his brother's house. His situation and his relation to his brother have consequences for him that need to be confronted.

Content_1: فروغ بعد از بیست سال زندگی مشترک با شوهرش می فهمد که او سه سال با زنی به نام ساغر رابطه داشته و بعد از اینکه ورشکسته شده، ساغر مهریه اش را به اجرا گذاشته و مشکات فعلاً در زندان است. فروغ برای خروج از بحران پیش آمده، تمام وسائل خانه اش را به حراج می گذارد تا…
Content_2: Fariba Khademi is captivating as the indomitable Forough, who finds herself forced to sell her possessions after her husband is sent to jail for failing to pay his second wife’s dowry. Pressured by her rival to sell her home, Forough tries her best to convince the young woman otherwise. Forough, with the support of her friend Nasrin, must also process some startling news. This intriguing film examines the complicated relationships between women in polygamous marriages.A middle-aged woman is a talented painter whose life is in crisis and her husband is in jail. She tries to save her family from this crisis by selling all her belongings, even her own clothes.

Content_1: فیلم عشق و خیانت با حضور علی انصاریان داستان مردی به نام رضا است که به زنش خیانت کرده و رابطه ای پنهانی با دختری دارد این امر در زندگی متاهلی او تاثیر گذاشته و باعث شده اتفاقاتی برای او رخ دهد ...
این فیلم درباره زندگی یک خانواده است که با مسائل و مشکلات مالی دست و پنجه نرم میکنند و تمامی این مسئولیت ها و مشکلات بر عهده مادر خانواده است زیرا...
Content_2: A World Full of Hope is based on the drama of a household where the mother is the breadwinner since the father of the family is incapable for reasons to be told…

Mahlagha Mallah is Iran’s eldest environmental activist and the founder of the first environmental NGO in Iran. Spending a few days in her home and accompanying her in environmental gatherings and activities is an excuse to portray the critical state of the environment in Iran. Website: karafilm.ir

Eskandar Firouz, the founder of the Department of Environment is known as "Iran's father of the environment". This documentation of a few-hours-long conversation of him and three environmental activists presents an oral history of issues of environment in Iran and a brief look at a lifetime of experience and the patriotic concerns of Eskandar Firouz. Website: karafilm.ir

Content_1: فیلم داستان دو خواهر است که با دختران تحصیلکرده و در شرف ازدواج شان، زندگی آرام , خوبی را دارند. اما در یک مهمانی خانوادگی و حضور مردی جوان و غریبه به عنوان مهمان ناخوانده، زندگی این دو خانواده را بحرانی میکند...
Content_2: Two sisters spend their peaceful life with their educated daughters marriageable age. But organizing a family gathering and the presence of a young stranger as an uninvited guest, greatly challenge the life of the two families...This film tells the story of two sisters who along with their educated daughters that are at a marriage age, live a good life together. But during a familial issue, they get together and the presence of a young stranger who is an uninvited guest, brings trouble to the life of these two families.

Content_1: مزار شریف، داستان کشتار دیپلمات های ایرانی در کنسولگری ایران در شهر مزار شریف افغانستان است که به دنبال حمله نیروهای طالبان منجر به شهادت 10 تن از کارکنان کنسولگری ایران شد.
Content_2: This is the story of Taliban's attack to Iranian Consulate in Mazar-e Sharif (1998) that resulted in the martyrdom of some Iranian diplomats.The story is about Taliban’s attack on Iran’s embassy in Mazarsharif and the death of an Iranian diplomat.

A man wakes in the middle of a field with no memory. Is he dead? Is this purgatory? As he struggles to discover who he is, he is faced with startling revelations about himself and those around him. After being informed that he has a daughter, who has been taken hostage due to his part in a dangerous drug deal gone wrong. Will he be able to find the drugs, save the girl and figure out whom to trust?Farhad cannot remember anything. During 24 hours, he’s struggling to find his lost identity through the people he encounters.

Hassan is a teenager who plans to give away his family’s grounded ship for his father’s birthday. There are only 7 days left till his father’s birthday, when his older brother decides to sell the ship so he can take his pregnant wife to another country for giving birth. While the struggle between the two brother’s intensifies, their father’s birthday get closer.

Content_1: یک پسر جوان ( حامد بهداد ) که در مراسم ها آوازخوانی می کند، به زن آشپزی که بسیار از او بزرگتر است ( رویا نونهالی ) دل می بندد اما...
Content_2: When the resident singer at a venue that hosts weddings and funerals abruptly quits his job, a young, charming new singer (Hamed Behdad) is hired. Unexpectedly, a romantic relationship begins to develop between him and older, widowed woman who also works at the venue, though neither is immediately aware of the other’s emotions. The romance that ensues creates as much chaos as it does tenderness. This is a star-studded and incredibly entertaining ride.The story of unusual loves from wedding to funeral.

Content_1: فیلم بهمن با بازی فاطمه معتمد آریا داستان زنی به نام هما از کارکشته ترین پرستاران بیمارستان است كه پیشنهاد شب کاری ده روزه ای را قبول میکند. هما که دچار بی خوابی است، بحران های متعدد کاری و درون خانوادگی او را تا سر حد فروپاشی میبرد و...
Content_2: Homa, an accomplished nurse working in a private hospital, has a recurrent dream that brings her a feeling of peace. When an unprecedented snowstorm strikes the area, she is forced to work a 10-day shift, and she finds herself having to care for the unpleasant elderly mother of the hospital's owner. Soon, both women feel increasingly hemmed in by the stagnant hospital, and as insomnia begins to take hold of Homa, she starts to spiral deep into depression. Striking snowscapes lend a haunting melancholy to this thought-provoking interaction between two women.A middle-aged mother whose child is living outside Iran has a problem with one of the patients at work. Her husband wants to be a writer. The woman feels lonely and this makes the days of her life to be cold and malcontent.

Content_1: سالار یکی از ملاکین بانفوذ منطقهٔ هزارجریب، در آرزوی فرزند تصمیم می‌گیرد برای چهارمین بار ازدواج کند. آق‌عمو که معتاد به مواد مخدر است و در گاوداری صالح مشغول به کار است، می‌پذیرد در ازای پرداخت بدهی‌ که به صالح دارد، دخترش را به عقد برادرش سالار در بیاورد. بهار که از قبل دل در گروی کسری داشته، در مقابل این پیشنهاد به شدت مخالفت می‌کند.
Content_2: When the strong-willed Bahar catches the attention of wealthy landowner Salar, she faces the prospect of a forced marriage to someone 40 years her senior. Unhappy and desperate for control over her own destiny, she decides to run away with her true love. However, this proves to be far from easy, and soon both Salar and Bahar’s abusive father Aghamoo are on her trail. Sweet, romantic, and at times tragic, this drama questions how far we are willing to go for love.TABOO is the story of a67 years old Iranian Landowner in North of Iran . In spite of having 3 legal Wife He is pushing one of his workers — who has a beautiful 24 years old daughter — , to force her daughter into marriage with him, The girl is a student in a university in Rasht ( a city north of Iran ) and she is very active in Social Student Activities in the university , in the same time she is in love with one of her classmate who is elementary teacher in a village near to town, They compelled her to goes to marriage ceremony but she escapes and goes to the school that her lover is teaching , but he doesn’t keep her since all the students discover she is there and send her to his small apartment in the city who shares with two of his friends but the apartment is not safe and he send her to a deserted Ship that one of his friend makes Alcohol and vin illegally there , but they are in terrible , The man and the father find them for Revenge….

In this energetic black comedy, a stone thrown through a window becomes the catalyst for a family feud between two sisters and their families. Azar's son, Babak, is to marry Mahshid, Azadeh's daughter. However, things don't quite go to plan, and what begins as tension between the two factions becomes an all-out war. When kidnapping and attempted murder are added to the mix, it is unclear if the family will ever see eye to eye. Narrated by Azar's writer son, Fahrad, the film’s eclectic cast and episodic nature is reminiscent of the work of Wes Anderson.Do you know what I like about Maradona? I like that in his life there was never a line between reality and fantasy; when he was playing, he was playing with all his heart, he flew when he was not playing; and when he was an addict, he would put a mountain of cocaine in front of himself and used it, he went to the extremes… All because reality and fantasy had no border for him; and if it even had, he couldn’t recognize the line.

Content_1: فیلم مردن به وقت شهریور به کارگردانی هاتف علیمردانی داستان پسری است که در آستانه کنکور است و در این بین با پسری خیابانی که عاشق موسیقی رپ است آشنا میشود و شرایط بد خانوادگی و این دوستی او را به سمتی سوق میدهد که اتفاقاتی برای اون می افتد و ....
Content_2: This gentle drama follows the story of Sina, a gifted young man with a passion for music. Under his father's authoritarian supervision, Sina juggles studying for university with taking care of his handicapped brother. Sina longs for more adventure from life, and gets exactly what he wished for when he is introduced to the smooth-talking M.J., and Sina agrees to sing with him at the studio. However, it soon becomes clear to Sina that there is more to his new friend than meets the eye. As Sina spends more time under M.J.'s influence, his relationship with his disapproving father deteriorates further. The relationship between fathers and sons is at the core of this film, and its combination of compelling drama and beautiful cinematography makes it a must-watch.Sina has a few months to pass university's entrance.

Shokoofeh and Peyman are a couple who have committed a robbery. They are going to Anzali’s port to meet someone but they don’t know that their greedy path that they have taken is full of danger...This movie is about a young couple named Danial and Shokofeh. They look for someone in the north of the country. By accident, the bag that they have with them falls into the swamp and Danial goes into the water to retrieve it and while joking and betting with Shokofeh, he swims into the deep end and drowns. Shokofeh looks for a man named Bahram Buffalo. Bahram goes into the water with scuba diving gears after getting paid and opens the bag and takes the gold inside it. A new chapter opens up in Shokofeh’s life and she enters Bahram’s life as a result of asking for his help.

This incredibly candid short film focuses on the young Sharifeh, an illiterate child whose circumstances have forced her to take a position as a W.C. attendant. As director Azar Mehrabi asks her question after question, Sharifeh's smiling face belies a heartbreaking despair for the hopelessness of her situation. When Mehrabi offers her the chance to operate the camera herself however, Sharifeh's inquisitive spirit and intelligence shine through. By centering on the plight of one young girl, Mehrabi highlights concerning issues affecting contemporary Iran’s impoverished younger population.

A stunning piece of work from Hamidreza Faramarzi, this film focuses on the life of renowned graphic designer Ebrahim Haghighi. Beginning his career in the 1960s, Haghighi's work spanned across several industries, including advertising, film, and the arts. His extensive involvement with the Fajr Film Festival and beyond won him prestige the world over, most notably in the Ukraine, then Czechoslovakia, and of course, Iran itself. Featuring interviews with Rakhshan Bani Etemad, artist Aydin Aghdashloo, and filmmaker Rasoul Sadr Ameli, this documentary is a must for any arts lover.

This vibrant documentary takes us on a historical journey of Iranian music throughout the 20th century. In order to understand our recent past, however, the film casts its eye back even further; we learn that following the Arab conquest, Zoroastrian musicians placed great emphasis on the expression of emotion in their work. Following a 300 year silence, music gradually seeped its way back into the region, before blooming into the massive industry we know today. Informative and beautifully shot, this film features insight from such experts as poets Simin Behbahani and Ahmad Reza Ahmadi. Of course, Saffarian's retrospective documentary also showcases plenty of music from the 1900s through the early 2000s. Exuding pop and vintage appeal, as well as boasting visually striking and exclusive footage, 'Night of Infatuation' will take you on a nostalgic journey back in time.

Content_1: خلاصه داستان ملبورن درامی معمایی ست دربارهٔ زوجی جوان که در آستانه سفر ناخواسته درگیر ماجرایی پیچیده می‌شوند  ملبورن فیلمی به کارگردانی و نویسندگی نیما جاویدی و تهیه‌کنندگی جواد نوروزبیگی ساخته سال ۱۳۹۲ است. این فیلم رقابتهای بین المللی خود را با حضور در فستیوال فیلم ونیز(۲۰۱۴) به عنوان فیلم افتتاحیه هفته منتقدین آغاز کرد و بعد از حضور در چهار فستیوال الف (ونیز- توکیو- قاهره- ماردل پلاتا) از چهار قاره دنیا و بیش از ۶۰ حضور بین المللی در فستیوالهایی چون ‌آسیا پاسفیک، استکهلم،‌ زوریخ، شانگهای، استانبول، دوبلین، ملبورن، خیخون، براتیسلاوا، لوگزامبورگ، بریزبین، هانوی، ادینبورگ، آلماتی، کرالا، چنای، بنگلور، ویلنیوس، لیسبون، آنونی، آرس و ... موفق به کسب ۱۳ جایزه ی بین المللی شد.فیلم ملبورن با بازی پیمان معادی ، نگار جواهریان و مانی حقیقی داستان زوجی است که در حال مهاجرت به استرالیا هستند و تنها چند ساعت به پروازشان مانده. آنها با قبول نگهداری نوزاد یکی از همسایه ها درگیر مشکلاتی میشوند که میتواند آینده انها را به خطر بیاندازد....
Content_2: Hours before leaving Tehran for a three-year stay in Melbourne, young couple Amir (Peyman Moaadi) and Sara (Negar Javaherian) find themselves looking after a neighbour's newborn, left to them by the nanny. However, this well-meaning favour soon turns tragic and threatens to derail more than just their plans to move abroad. Unfolding in real-time and almost entirely within a Tehran apartment, this psychological drama patiently burrows to the heart of its moral dilemma, where doing the right thing may in fact be the very worst choice for this well-meaning couple. Assisted by excellent performances, intimate cinematography and expert editing, 'Melbourne' is a compellingly universal and thoroughly engrossing movie. A very tense thriller not to be missed!A young couple who wants to migrate to Australia when they get involved in something unexpected the day of their departure

Content_1: این فیلم داستان زنی به نام رعنا است که در ماه هفتم بارداری خود است وی که یک بار دچار سقط جنین شده به شوهر خود شک کرده که این باعث مشکلاتی در زندگی آنها می شود، رعنا با اصرار شوهرش مهرداد به خانه پدرش در مرزن آباد می رود اما در آنجا دچار حادثه می شود...
Content_2: Captivating social drama. At seven months pregnant, Rana is worried she may lose her child after having multiple abortions previously. Her husband shows little sympathy for their situation. Worries of infidelity begin to creep across her mind as she feels isolated in her plight. A dreadful turn of events brings him out of his complacency and forces him to re-evaluate his life choices.

Content_1: خانواده آمپول چی که تولیدکننده آمپول هستند با وحشت فرزندان شان از آمپول مواجه می شوند؛ ولی در نهایت ورزش فوتبال و انتخاب برای رده های قهرمانی به کمک فرزندان شان می آید. این فیلم در جشنواره فیلم کودک و نوجوان اصفهان بسیار موفق بوده و به عنوان پرمخاطب ترین فیلم لقب گرفته است.
Content_2: Ice Era is a compelling tale of betrayal and addiction. In the tenth year of their marriage, Babak and Manizheh face the biggest challenge of their lives. When they run into financial problems, Babak is forced to work long hours to support them. This only proves to push them apart and a romantic betrayal leads to drug dependency and psychological collapse. Will the couple find their way out of the maze of ruin they are in? Farhad Aslani and Mahtab Keramati star in this gripping thriller.A couple get involved with a suspicious murder that happens at a party one night and are looking for the main clue and the murderer.

Content_1: از مجلس عروسی مرجان آغاز می شود. در میانه های عروسی ماموران برای دستگیری داماد خلافکار وارد می شوند و میهمانان هم فرار می کنند. در این میان ریختن آب آلبالو روی پیراهن داوود باعث آشنایی ناگهانی او و آیدا می شود و اتفاقات ناخواسته ای برای آن ها می افتد...
Content_2: Romantic comedy following a young woman and her peculiar journey to unlikely love. A wedding is sent spiralling into pandemonium after the disreputable groom begins shooting his gun mid ceremony. As the guests disperse, two strangers, Aida (Mona Ahmadi) and Davoud (Saed Soheili), become closer than anticipated when they get into a fender bender involving a police car. Upon lying to the questioning officer that Davoud is her husband, a relationship is sparked that neither party expected. A raucously funny and adventurous comedy.The story starts at the wedding of Marjan. In the middle of the wedding, police come to arrest the groom who is a criminal and the guests run away. Meanwhile, some cherry juice is dropped on Davood and this leads him to meet Aida and this creates some unexpected problems for them.

Content_1: فیلم ناهید با بازی نوید محمدزاده و ساره بیات داستان ناهید، زن جوانی است که از شوهرش احمد به خاطر اعتیادش طلاق گرفته و خرج زندگی خود و پسر کوچکش را از طریق تایپ پایان نامه های دانشجویی درمی آورد. طبق توافق با همسر سابقش، او تنها در صورتی می تواند بچه را نزد خودش نگه دارد که ازدواج نکند اما ....
Content_2: Nahid, played by Sareh Bayat, has fought her way through a difficult divorce from her gambling-addicted husband. She has escaped with custody of her son, Amir Reza, and her freedom on one condition: that she never remarries. Financially struggling to support herself and the troublesome Amir Reza on her typist's wage, her prayers are answered in the form of Masood, a widower and successful business owner. Will she marry Masood at the risk of losing custody of her son or is there a way to navigate her husband's divorce terms? Reminiscent of Farhadi's 'A Separation', director Ida Panahandeh takes a look at Iran's strict divorce laws, but with the additional complication of the controversial 'temporary marriage'.

A witty tale that follows a humble milkman who has the arduous task of travelling from village to village to make a living for himself. Sympathetic to his plight, his friend and wedding singer Rajab tries his best to lend his help with hysterical consequences. Loveable Rajab is an endearing and wry experience from start to finish.

Content_1: فیلم مشکل گیتی با بازی حمید فرخ نژاد درباره زوجی به نام ایرج و گیتی است که در آستانه فرو پاشی زندگی مشتركشان هستند، توهمی كه بر اثر زندگی اینترنتی گیتی، به وجود آمده بر زندگی واقعی این دو سایه انداخته است....
Content_2: Externally Iraj and Giti are happy middle-aged couple. Giti is addicted to her mobile and the internet. On the same day that Iraj complains to Giti about the constant use of her mobile, a woman named Sofia comes to Iraj's company. Iraj seems to be distracted by Sofia and Giti becomes aware of this. As Iraj and Sofia’s relationship develops, Giti’s frustration toward both of them steadily increases. With Iraj’s continual denial and with any proof to validate Giti’s claims seemingly vanishing, tensions run high potentially severing the chance to reconnect with each other.  Synopsis by IMVboxThis film is about a young couple named Giti and Iraj whose lives is on the verge of destruction, a hallucination caused by Giti’s virtual life has overshadowed the couple’s real life.

Hamid is a music teacher for orphaned children who, together with his half-sister Maryam, takes a busload of them on a trip to the seaside. They cross paths with Minou, a young woman struggling to come to terms with her father's remarriage. Sympathetic to the orphans' situation, and hoping to provide a distraction from her attempts to bond with her stepmother, Minou invites them to come and stay on her land. As she and Hamid begin to fall in love, other agencies contrive to prevent them in this bittersweet comedy about chance encounters and love blossoming from the simplest of gestures.Sarmadi is Mino's father and is a wealthy man who has temporarily married Nahid, who is after his money. He is supposed to permanently marry her after getting his daughter’s consent. They go to Sarmadi’s villa in the northern part of the country and…

Danial is a talented pottery maker from the north of Iran. A teenager, Danial has grown up without his father, who died in the Iran-Iraq War, and whose identity he often tries to inject into his art. One day he makes a vase and sends it into a competition under his father's name, but when it wins the top prize, questions are raised about the identity of the artist when the man tied to it has been dead for years. As Danial tries to keep the memory of his father alive, he also must come to terms with the truth of his situation in this loving drama about the psychology of letting go.

Content_1: عطا و معصومه زن و شوهری هستند که در خانه ای مستأجر بوده و موعد تخلیه منزل مسکونی شان فرار رسیده است اما عطا می خواهد هر طور که شده قرارداد را تمدید کند با آنکه با مشکل مالی مواجه است.
Content_2: Ata (Saber Abar) and Masoumeh (Negar Javaherian) find themselves feeling the pressure when their finances take a turn for the worse in this enjoyable romp. The couple's landlord has decided to put the rent up, and they have only one month to get the extra cash or vacate the property. A race against time ensues, and Ata is prepared to do anything he can to come up with the money. A humorous look at how far a desperate man will go when the odds are stacked against him.Ata and Masomeh are a couple who are renting a house and the time comes for them to move, but Ata is trying to renew the contract even though he does not have the financial means.

Content_1: احمد که دوران نوجوانی اش را در سکوت گذرانده و اکنون بزرگتر شده، فرمانده لشکری می شود که باید در دروازه های خرمشهر با دشمن بجنگند. اما سرنوشت او فرسنگ ها دور از مرزهای ایران رقم می خورد. این فیلم دربارهٔ زندگی احمد متوسلیان است.
Content_2: Ahmad Motevaselian is a commander who defends his country from invading forces, but his mysterious fate is ultimately determined far from his homeland. Through genuine audio excerpts and entirely narrated by his comrades and family members, this unique biopic meticulously recounts the extraordinary life-story of one of the Revolutionary Guards’ most prominent commanders.Ahmad who spends his teenage years in silence becomes the commander of an army that must fight the enemy in the gates of Khorramshahr, but his destiny lays kilometers away, outside of Iran’s border. This film is a reenactment of something that happened during the Iran-Iraq war.

Content_1: مردی به نام جلال آگهی غریبی در یکی از روزنامه های صبح تهران منتشر می کند که در آن اعلام می کند می خواهد پول زیادی را به یک مستمند ببخشد...
Content_2: A well-meaning philanthropist places an advert pledging to give away 30 million tomans to someone in need, but the generous act causes chaos among the crowds that arrive to claim the gift. 'Wednesday, May 9' is broken up into three separate narratives: a woman who needs the money for a life-changing operation for her disabled husband, a pregnant woman who needs the money to get her innocent husband out of jail and the third is that of the misguided benefactor himself. This Venice award-winning, debut feature from director Vahid Jalilvand highlights the plight of the poor in Iran and how generosity teamed with faulty judgement can worsen the situation.The film is about three characters whose story is told separately: Jalal Ashtiani, who has advertised in a newspaper about giving 30 million Tomans worth of his property to the needy; Leila, whose husband has become disabled because of an accident and needs 15 million Tomans for an operation; and Setareh, who has lost her parents in Bam earthquake years ago and now is living with her aunt’s family and has secretly married to Morteza against their wishes.

Content_1: داستان فیلم سه اپیزودی «جامه دران»، دربارهٔ زنی به نام شیرین است که در مراسم ختم پدرش به روابط جدیدی در زندگی او پی می برد و حقایقی تازه را کشف می کند...
Content_2: A Persian Melody - Jameh Daran - جامه دران  Whilst at her father's funeral, Shirin notices a man that looks eerily like her late father. Naturally this raises questions. Shirin’s uncle is initially hesitant to divulge information about the man, but eventually admits he is her illegitimate brother. Shirin’s mother, seeing the effect of this news, decides to unveil the family’s well-hidden secret surrounding the brother and Shirin’s own origins. As director Hamidreza Ghotbi’s debut feature film received three nominations from the Fajr Film Festival, it is hailed as a one of the seminal screenplay adaptations in the Iranian film industry to date.

Content_1: فیلم سایه روشن روایتگر داستان مردی است به نام رامین (محمدرضا فروتن) که دچار فراموشی گردیده و با کمک زنی پرستار سعی دارد حافظه اش را به دست آورد...
Content_2: A man awakes to find substantial gaps in his long and short term memory, leaving him unsure of his identity and past. A therapist arrives to help him recollect his lost memories. As she aids him in bringing certain mysteries to light, it becomes evident that aspects of the memories lack cohesion and are rife with confusion. Ultimately providing more questions than answers, the memories start to reveal darker insights into his past. Maybe some things are better left forgotten.Ramin is a middle-aged man who suffers from amnesia and a woman helps him regain his memory…

Content_1: فیلم این سیب هم برای تو ، داستان دو دختر جوان است که با هم دوست هستند و در حالی که یکی از آنها نامزد دارد، رابطه عاشقانه ای بین نامزد دختر با دوست او برقرار شده است....
Content_2: When a woman named Bita finds out that her ex-fiancé married her best-friend, she starts plotting her revenge against them...

Content_1: این فیلم داستان خسرو است که ۲۳ روز بر پهنه دریا و به دور از خانواده اش گذرانده است. او با دنیایی از ابهامات فکری که تمام مدت همراه او بوده وارد خانه اش در تهران می شود اما تمامی ذهنیت هایش عینیت یافته و قادر به مقابله با مسائل پیش آمده نیست.
Content_2: Khosro who has spent 23 days on the sea and away from his family, goes back to his house in Tehran with a mind full of ambiguity and troubles that bother him the whole time. After his return, all his thoughts become reality and he is unable to face these issues and this puts him in a difficult situation against his wife...

Content_1: فیلم یحیی سکوت نکرد با بازی فاطمه معتمد آریا داستان یحیی است که پدرش پس از مرگ مادر او را به عمه اش می سپارد، عمه ای تلخ و نا آشنا که زندگی پر راز و رمزی دارد او با ورود به این دنیای متفاوت در پی کشف مفاهیم جدید زندگی و شاید یافتن جایگزینی برای مادر است و این کنکاش هزینه سنگینی برایش به همراه می آورد.
Content_2: Seven-year-old Yahya is being looked after by his aunt while his dad is away. A strange aunt with a life full of secrets and a controversial reputation. As Yahya adapts to this new, mysterious world he also sets out to seek the meaning of life. An adventure that will cost him dear…

Abu Zeinab follows the story of a Lebanese family during occupation of the country's lands by Israeli forces. This harrowing war drama portrays the sacrifice of a mother for her family during times of national conflict. A secret she is keeping only makes her situation more burdensome. Carmen Lebbos stars in this wartime feature...The film tells the story of a Lebanese family during the years of the country’s occupation by Israeli forces. It involves the story of the family's devoted mother and her tolerance and sacrifices while carrying a great secret.

PERSIAN_title: خانه‌ای در خیابان چهل و یکم
Content_1: خانه ای در خیابان چهل و یکم، داستان دعوای دو برادر است که باعث قتل یکی از آنها می شود. این آغاز بحران است چون برادر قاتل می گریزد اما مادر، راضی اش می کند که خود را به دست قانون بسپارد. مادر این خانواده و دو عروسش که در سه طبقه یک خانه زندگی می کنند، سعی دارند هر کدام به تنهایی بار مشکلات پیش آمده در زندگی را به دوش بکشند و در این مسیر، ماجراهایی رخ می دهد که طی فیلم روایت می شود.
Content_2: A middle-class family in Tehran falls apart when brother kills brother over a bounced check. Mohsen the murderer has run off and the womenfolk, the mother and her two daughters-in-law who live in three spacious apartments in a building together are left to deal with the aftermath...  Synopsis by IMVbox.com

A fascinating insight into the Iranian pop music industry, Nasser Saffarian examines the history of the 'anti-love song,' a form that rejects the idea of the conventional love song in favor of darker subject matter, such as bitterness, betrayal and regret. Featuring interviews with established musicians and poets such as Shahkar Binesh Pajouh, Pari Zanganeh, and Ahmad Reza Ahmadi, the film details the genre’s emergence in the early 2000s. However, we learn that anti-love song themes have existed as far back as the 1960s. An absorbing, fantastically researched film.

Content_1: داستان فیلم شکاف داستان زوج جوانی است که بدون اینکه بخواهند برای مدت کوتاهی از فرزند دوست خود مراقبت می کنند اما حادثه ای که برای کودک اتفاق می افتد باعث می شود که زندگی این زوج درگیر بحران شود...
Content_2: Thirty-year-olds, Sarah and Peyman must quickly decide on parenthood as Sarah is suffering from a rare disease which might soon render her infertile. Her gynecologist advises her to have a child before it is too late. However, becoming a parent is no easy matter, especially when the question is further complicated by the breakup of a couple of close friends whose son is torn between his parents.

Content_1: «به خودتان تکان بدهید تا خدا تکانتان نداده.» این جمله ای است که حاجی یوسف، پیرمرد زاهد شهر با دیدن آسیب های اجتماعی به مردم و مسئولین گوشزد می کند اما برخی او را جدی نمی گیرند و برخی نیز با شایعه وقوع زلزله و عذاب دستمایه شروع داستان را فراهم می کنند.
Content_2: Aref Zahedi enters into a modern and developed city where he observes the daily life of the citizens and warns them about their life style and God’s punishment. His warnings create rumors amongst the citizens about a forthcoming earthquake in the city."Till God doesn’t shake you, you will not do anything", says Haj Yusuf, a devoted old man, to the people and the city authority who are involved in social and moral vices. After the warning of Haj Yusuf, the peace of the city is disturbed by the rumor that God is going to send a divine disaster.

This modern drama has been put on stage by Farid Bozorgmehr. The story is about the young professional generation of Iranians and their marital and social problems and conflicts. Written by one of the best Iranian playwrights, Mohammad Yaghoubi, whose controversial plays have created a sensation in Iran.

Content_1: روایتگر زندگی پیرمردی روستایی به نام ابوالقاسم با بازی حسن اسدی است که گلاب پاش هیات روستایشان است. او ناگهان متوجه می شود که… .

میرهاشم طلبه‌ای جوان است که به همراه همسرش فرشته به تازگی توانسته خانه‌ای کوچک بخرد. تهیهٔ پول خانه باعث شده میرهاشم از چک بانکی استفاده کند و حالا چک به دست یک شرخر افتاده‌است. البته در این راه سختی‌هایی زیادی می‌کشد.
Content_2: Mirhashem is a young clergy who has bought a small home recently. He uses a cashier's check in order to afford it; but a bully has the check now. Mirhashem's wife has left him alone due to the troubles made by the bully. He becomes a clergy of an old but important mosque in North of Iran. The bully makes troubles all the time and he asks Mirhashem to pay him back from the people's cash vow.

Content_1: عباس و هدیه زوج خوشبختی اند و عباس راننده تاکسی است. زندگی عادی آن ها بعد از مطلع شدن از سرطان هدیه، زن عباس، وارد مرحله جدیدی می شود
نادر سرپرست یک گروه موسیقی است که با دوستش تصمیم به نقشه اجرای دزدی می گیرد که در این مسیر با مشکلات و اتفاقاتی مواجه می شوند

Content_2: When brothers in law Tooraj and Iraj discover a surprising secret about the effects of eating ostrich meat, they feed it to their wives with hilarious results. Eager to capitalize on their find, the pair open an ostrich meat restaurant to enable others to benefit from their magical food’s properties. This lighthearted comedy’s vibrant cast and beautiful lighting make 'Ostrich' an unforgettable caper.

Rajab and his fiancé come to the city to follow their dreams of becoming actors. They start their career by getting cast as extras. Soon their families find out about their motives and come to the city.   Synopsis by IMVBox

Content_1: ابراهیم و فخری در خانه ای قدیمی زندگی می کنند و سه فرزندشان شهید شده و فرزند چهارم رضا جانباز قطع نخاعی است و در آسایشگاه نگهداری می شود. ابراهیم و فخری تصمیم می گیرند که رضا را به خانه بیاورند و ...
Content_2: An old couple decide to bring home their war veteran son from care but he doesn't want to be home and certain truths are revealed that surprises the family...Ibrahim and Fakhri live in an old house and three of their children have died in a war and their fourth, Reza, is a paralyzed veteran who lives in a hospice under care. Reza becomes angry and rude after the death of his veteran friend Kamal and is no longer taking his medicine. Because of this, his parents decide to bring him home and take care of him. Mahbobeh, Kamal’s sister comes to their house and is willing to marry Reza based on their previous commitment but Reza rejects her. Reza is insistent that he must die and his action causes Ibrahim to slap him one time. One night it seems like they all are affected by gas; the three dead children return to the house. Mahbobeh’s family are supposed to come to their house but Fakhri wants to put it off because of the oldness and broken down condition of the house. But Ibrahim is against it. The return of their dead children brings happiness and calmness to the house and even Reza is calm and he now takes his medicine. The day is Mid-Sha'ban and we hear the voice of Haj Ibrahim who tells of his children’s death to his unseen guests.

Rezvan is a surrogate for wealthy couple Hamid and Homa. Despite their different outlooks on the world, the couple have trusted her to carry the child they always wanted. However, when a devastating accident takes place, it looks as if Rezvan will have to give up the child. This is not the least of her worries, as she also has to contend with an emotionally unstable brother-in-law and the painful recollections of her late husband. The coming birth is the only ray of light she can see in a bleak future, and now even that seems uncertain. As the date draws nearer, Rezvan continually wonders if life can be like the raspberry bush and if some good can come from bad circumstances.Hamid and Homa are an infertile couple that decide to try surrogacy to have a child. These two meet a young woman named Rezvan while following the path of choosing a reliable person, who while is a good fit, also has some problems. Something happens to this couple after they meet Rezvan that makes them get a new understanding of themselves and their surroundings.

Content_1: فیلم خانوم روایت سه زن، سه نقطه تهران از شمال تا جنوب است. در این فیلم مردان قصه بد نیستند. خانوم، گوشه ای از فداکاری زنان ایرانی استفیلم خانوم روایت سه زن، سه نقطه تهران از شمال تا جنوب است. در این فیلم مردان قصه بد نیستند. خانوم، گوشه ای از فداکاری زنان ایرانی است.
Content_2: Three days in Tehran, three women from different social classes, engaged with the problems in their lives, but trying to solve them...

Content_1: فیلم چ به کارگردانی ابراهیم حاتمی کیا با بازی فریبرز عرب نیا به اتفاقات و شخصیت شهید مصطفی چمران در 2 روز از درگیری های پاوه می پردازد.
Content_2: In the summer of 1979, during a big crisis in a city in southwest of the country, Dr. Mostapha Chamran, a well known Iranian guerilla along with General Fallahi, commander land forces, enters the city to evaluate the situation. CHE narrates 48 hours in the life of Chamran when he is directly engaged in action in the city of Paveh, a city surrounded by anti revolutionary forces...

Content_1: فیلم اسید داستان افسری را روایت می کند که برای شناسایی یک باند مواد مخدر وارد اعضای این باند شده و درباره آنان به تحقیق می پردازد...
داستان فیلم اطراف آرامش از آنجا آغاز می شود که ارثیه ای به همسر فردی به نام قاسم می رسد. این اتفاق باعث می شود تا آرامش زندگی آن ها تا حدودی از بین برود و …

Content_2: One of the most groundbreaking titles in the history of Iranian cinema, this documentary gives us exclusive insight into the complex world of Persian filmmaking. Rana is a kindhearted young mother struggling to provide for her son as she awaits her husband's release from prison, while 'Eddie,' or Adineh, tries to escape the clutches of her oppressive father in order to pursue a sex change abroad. As we follow the intertwined lives of these protagonists, we learn not just what it means to be transgender in contemporary Iran, but how women must bend to fit the roles carved out for them by a patriarchal hierarchy. A chance to witness how a modern masterpiece is formed.

Content_1: طاها و ریحان مدتی است به خاطر یک آگهی در روزنامه مشغول مراقبت از پیرمردی به اسم منوچهر آصف هستند. به زودی در خانه آصف اتفاقاتی روی می‌دهد که طاها و ریحان را دچار مشکلاتی کرده و آنها را در سر در گمی قرار می‌دهد.
Content_2: Story of a man caught between two roads. Either doing his duty, or keeping his word. He has not much time to decide, and has to choose between two...Taha and Reyhan are working as a nurse for an old man named Asef. They become his employees through an ad in the newspaper. Something happens in Asef’s house that leads to their desperation and these two are left with two choices.

Content_1: کالسکه، چالش های بین یک زوج جوان است بر سر اینکه در ایران بمانند یا مهاجرت کنند و شرایط اقامت در کشور دیگر برای آنان فراهم شده است.
Content_2: A couple's marriage is endangered when they meet a friend from the past.

The story is based in the 80s and tells the story of the Communist forces in the northern part of the country - Amol- and is about a woman named, Shahrzad, who is known as the Little Black Fish who has entered the fight to avenge her husband...This film happens in the 80s and tells the story of the Communist forces in the northern part of the country, in Amol, and is about a woman named Shahrzad who is known as Small Black Fish who has entered the fight to avenge her husband and now meets two other characters, They began to have an ideologic discussion about the fight and the Communist thought process and…

Content_1: رضا یک خبرنگار آزاد است که به طور اتفاقی سرنخ هایی از هیوا سرباز عراقی پیدا می کند که سال ها پیش رضا را در شرایط سخت جنگی نجات داده است. او برای جواب به مسائلی که سال هاست از اطرافیانش پنهان کرده عازم عراق می شود....
دختری به نام سحر به بهانه مهریه، قصد کلاهبرداری از همسر آینده خود را دارد و در این بین درگیر ماجراهایی می شود…

فیلم آدم باش داستان مردی است که در ارتباط با مردم دچار مشکل است و در عوض رابطه بسیار خوبی با حیوانات دارد. او سال ها خارج از ایران زندگی کرده و حالا که برگشته احساس می کند هیچ یک از مردم را نمی شناسد....
Content_2: The story of a man whose interpretation in communicating with people is in trouble, but instead he is very good in interaction with the animals...

EN_title: What Men Don't Know About Women
Content_2: A middle aged doctor with a wife and two children living a calm peaceful life falls in love with a woman 30 years younger than him and marries her. This causes a lot of trouble. The movie theme is in connection with temporary marriage, raising a comic atmosphere.A doctor falls in love with a woman who is thirty years old younger than himself, even though he has a wife, two kids and a calm life. This leads to some incidents that make up the story of the film…

Content_1: داستان این فیلم در دهه ۶۰ می‌گذرد، جائیکه دو دوست برای رسیدن به هدفی با یکدیگر همراه می‌شوند. فیلم خانه ای در کنار ابرها، در بخش نگاهِ نو سی و دومین جشنوارهٔ فیلم فجر، نامزد دو سیمرغ بلورین شد که در بخش فیلم نامه موفق به دریافت دیپلم افتخار گردید. این فیلم همچنین در پنجمین دورهٔ جشنوارهٔ مردمی فیلم عمار، موفق به کسب فانوس بخش داستانی بلند شد و…
Content_2: During the Iran and Iraq war, two young men scam the soldier's family.The story of this film happens in the 80s, a place where two friends go along with each other to reach a goal.

Content_1: ماجرای جوانی است که به اتفاق دوستانش از کارخانه اخراج می شود و بدلیل پرداخت نشدن حقوقشان تصمیم میگیرند به هر صورت حقشان را بگیرند…
این فیلم داستان زندگی مردی است که بدست همسرش کشته می شود.کاراگاهان پرونده را پیگیری کرده و زن را دستگیر میکنند ولی داستان با ورود افسران آگاهی روال دیگری می یابد....
این فیلم که ساخته مرتضی آتش زمزم می باشد درمورد بیماری مالیخولیا است این بیماری که نوعی دوگانگی هویت و توهم در فرد اینجا میکند. داستان این فیلم به کسانی میپردازد که دچار این مشکل دوگانگی هویت هستند..

Content_2: The story of this film is about Lucky Luke who is sent to another state to capture a criminal by the mayor after arresting Dalton brothers. While he is away, there is an earthquake and when he returns, everything has changed.

Content_1: فیلم پی ۲۲ بر اساس مستند ناوچه جوشن ساخته شده است. این رویداد در تاریخ فروردین سال ۶۷ در درگیری با نیروی دریایی ایالات متحده آمریکا اتفاق افتاد
Content_2: An Iranian navy commando after a confrontation with the enemy and having his boat sunk, remains in the sea for two days waiting to be rescued. Meanwhile he remembers his past. When a second opportunity arises, he decides to face them once again...

Content_1: این فیلم داستان یک کودک است که با وجود رسیدن به ۶ سالگی هنوز حرف نمی‌زند و همه او را مسخره می‌کنند و در خانواده و اطرافیان به غیر از مادر کسی از او حمایت نمی‌کند و بیشتر به پسر بزرگتر توجه دارند. تا اینکه پسر بچه از دست آنها فرار کرده و یک زن و مرد سالخورده او را پیدا کرده و به خانه می‌برند و رفتار آنها در روحیه پسر تأثیر می‌گذارد، اما پس از بازگشت به خانه همان رفتارها از طرف پدر و مادر دیده می‌شود تا اینکه مادربزرگ به خانه می‌آید و به اصطلاح کلید رابطه با او را پیدا می‌کند.
Content_2: The film take place in Tehran 1990s and is the story of a 6-year-old boy, Shahab, who still can not talk and is being teased by everyone. Even in his family they care for his bigger brother more than him and only his mother is on his side until...Unhappy with his father's behavior, six-year-old Shahab does not speak. Everyone but his mother think that he is a dumb, naughty boy, but when he runs away, everything changes...

Content_1: برادرِ نتانیاهو برای انجام عملیات تروریستی جدید علیه دانشمندان هسته ای به ایران می آید. این مامور حرفه ای در ایران برای رسیدن به اهداف خود از یک راننده سوء استفاده می کند اما...
Content_2: An international assassin is tasked with killing an Iranian nuclear scientist...
The story of two friends called Majid and Hamed who are involved with each other’s problems and this in turn gets them involved in a police operation.

Content_1: حال موشها ۳۰ سال بزرگ‌تر شده‌اند. موش چاق و پرخور شهر موش‌ها که کپل نام دارد، پس از ۳۰ سال ازدواج کرده‌است. او با نارنجی، موش بسیار عشوه‌ای شهر موشها ازدواج کرده‌است. آن‌ها دو فرزند به نام‌های صورتی و کپلک دارند. کپلک شخصیتی با مزه و خنده دار دارد که شخصیت وی در داستان شهر موش ها۲ اتفاقات جالبی را در پی خواهد داشتبعد از تجربه موفق شهر موش ها، حالا مرضیه برومند فیلم شهر موش های 2 را ساخته است.  موشها ۳۰ سال بزرگ تر شده اند، کپل با نارنجی ازدواج کرده و با ثروتی که برای خود بهم زده صاحب یک رستوران و کافی شاپ شده است. کپل دو فرزند به نام های صورتی و کپلک دارد که درگیر ماجراهای جالبی در فیلم میشوند...
Content_2: Mice who have to leave their school and immigrate because of a wild cat who wants to eat them up.

Content_1: داستان پسر و دختری است که قصد دارند با یکدیگر ازدواج کنند اما با مخالفت پدر روبرو می شوند…

Content_2: Yahya is accused of murdering his wife who was in coma but is not convicted because of insuficient evidence. The wife's brother seeks revenge against Yahya whilst Yahya falls in love with a different woman but is haunted by guilty feelings for his ex wife...After a wrongful accusation, Yahia is found not guilty by the court, but it seems no one is interested in giving a helping hand to a wrongfully accused man. No one, but his beloved. No one but the one he is deeply in love with...
The life of Farzin (Mohsen Tanabandeh), a drug addict struggle with his addiction and how this is affecting him and his family...Farzin who is addicted to drugs and his family is facing problems .

Content_1: زندگی غزال زن جوانی که با همسرش دچار چالش شده است رو به فروباشی است. همسرش او را ترک می کند و…
