In need of money to support his brother in his future marriage prospects, Amir starts working as a debt collector for fellow ex-con Mohsen as he tries to adjust to the new Iran and makes amends for his past mistakes. Directed by Massoud Kimiayi, one of the few filmmakers from the country's pre-revolutionary period to remain active in the film industry, 'Protest' is a fascinating story about a man out of time struggling to acquaint himself with the climactic changes of the Iranian revolution...

In Iran, female singing voices are deemed to be too provocative, and women are prohibited from perfoming as solo artists by religious law. Demoted to backing singers, many women try to remain active despite the restrictions placed upon them, and Mojtaba Mirtahmasb's documentary sympathetically captures their struggles to be heard.

'P Mesle Peykan' is a short but enjoyable documentary about the Peykan car, which was made by Iran Khodro in unison with the UK. No longer available on the market, the Peykan was wildly popular at the time of production between 1968 and 1978. This film provides a taste of that popularity, acting as a final farewell to a beloved vehicle.

Mahmoud Rahmani's documentary is an exploration of the conflict between environmental concerns and poverty, which developed in the Zagros Mountain regions in the southwest of Iran. In the wake of floods which submerged 63 villages, making 15,000 people homeless, many people were forced to cut down trees illegally in order to make a living. Rahmani’s film explores the lives and mindsets of some of these people, while providing visually poetic shots of the mountain regions.

Content_1: در پی سقوط چوپان ده از کوه و همچنین حمله گرگ ها به گله اهالی روستا، آن ها پس از مشورت های زیاد، سرانجام تصمیم می گیرند که « علیمراد» و خواهرش «رباب » را برای چوپانی گله انتخاب کنند اهالی روستا معتقد هستند که علیمراد برای کار چوپانی بسیار جوان است و ممکن است از پس این کار برنیاید و تصمیم می گیرند مأموریتی به علیمراد بدهند تا او را امتحان کنند. و سپس در پی تدبیری که در مشورت جمعی به آن رسیده اند از علیمراد می خواهند تا قاطر پیری را به میان جنگل برده و برای گرگ ها رهایش کند تا بدین ترتیب مانع حمله مجدد گرگ ها به گله شوند «علیمراد» در عمل به راه حل دیگری می رسد و در بازگشت ناچار از گفتن دروغ می شود، اهالی او را از روستا می رانند، اما چوپان برای اثبات حقانیت خود حرف هایی دارد که به زعم اهالی بسیار عجيب استدر پی سقوط چوپان ده از کوه و همچنین حمله گرگ ها به گله اهالی روستا، آن ها پس از مشورت های زیاد، سرانجام تصمیم می گیرند که « علیمراد» و خواهرش «رباب » را برای چوپانی گله انتخاب کنند.  اهالی روستا معتقد هستند که علیمراد برای کار چوپانی بسیار جوان است و ممکن است از پس این کار برنیاید و تصمیم می گیرند مأموریتی به علیمراد بدهند تا او را امتحان کنند. و سپس در پی تدبیری که در مشورت جمعی به آن رسیده اند از علیمراد می خواهند تا قاطر پیری را به میان جنگل برده و برای گرگ ها رهایش کند تا بدین ترتیب مانع حمله مجدد گرگ ها به گله شوند...  «علیمراد» در عمل به راه حل دیگری می رسد و در بازگشت ناچار از گفتن دروغ می شود، اهالی او را از روستا می رانند، اما چوپان برای اثبات حقانیت خود حرف هایی دارد که به زعم اهالی بسیار عجيب است...
Content_2: Based on a popular children's folktale, 'Liar Shepherd' tells the story of a community on the lookout for a new shepherd in a neighbouring village when theirs is lost in a terrible accident. When a young boy named Ali is sent to take up the reins, the village is suspicious of his abilities. However, once his proficiency is proven, he is left in charge of the herd, while his sister Rhobab helps around the house. However, when the young shepherd is tasked with leaving a sickly mule to be eaten by wolves, he is forced to tell a lie, and then live with the consequences. An intriguing insight into the mind of a child, no matter how mature he may seem.Following the fall of the shepherd from the mountain and the wolves attacking the herd in a village, the inhabitants decide, after a lot of consultation, to choose Alimorad and his sister, Robab, as the shepherds. The rustic people believe that Alimorad may not be able to do the job, for he's too young. So they decide to give Alimorad a mission to examine him. Then, after some consultation, they demand Alimorad to take an old mule to the jungle, so that the wolf will stop attacking the herd. Alimorad finds another solution and when returning, he has to lie. The inhabitants expel him from the village, but the shepherd has many things to say that seem weird to the people to prove his rightfulness.

EN_title: In the Distance of Two Migrations
Content_2: Robert Safarian's documentary is an in-depth reflection on the life and works of Iranian-Armenian poet Azad Matian. In 1946, when he was four, Matian's father planned to emigrate to Armenia as part of the repatriation program planned by Soviet Armenia. However, the plan was cancelled and Azad stayed in Iran. Examining his life as he plans another emigration – this time to the United States – the theme of moving to new lands and new cultures provides a thought-provoking backdrop for this portrait of a fascinating creative talent.

Content_1: رضا که برای گذران زندگی مسافرکشی می کند، یک روز،سیاوش دوست و همکلاس دبیرستانش را سوار می کند، بعد از مدتی که خاطرات نوجوانی را مرور می کنند، به یاد آن روزها تصمیم می گیرند تا برای تفریح به شمال بروند. در جاده چالوس دختری (رویا) را سوار اتومبیل خود میکنند که هیچ از او نمیدانند. رویا پس از یک مشاجره خونین خانوادگی و ارتکاب قتل، از خانه گریخته است، آن دو تلاش می کنند تا با رویا دوست شوند، امّا رفتار سرد دختر که موهایش را هم از ته تراشیده، آن دو را عصبی و ناامید میکند. آنها به ویلایی خالی که متعلق به یکی از اقوام سیاوش است می روند، رویا، دور از چشم پسرها، به قصد خودکشی، تعداد زیادی قرص می خورد و آنچنان به خواب عمیقی فرو می رود که پسرها تصور می کنند او مرده است، پس تصمیم به دفن او در گوشه ای از ویلا میگیرند، اما وقتی می خواهند تصمیم خود را عملی کنند متوجه می شوند که او زنده است، پس او را به بیمارستان می رسانند و رضا خود را برادر دختر معرفی میکند. اما در بیمارستان، رویا زمانی که به هوش می آید، از بیمارستان فرار میکند. رضا و سیاوش هم پس از فرار رویا، با تمهیدی بیمارستان را ترک میکنند اما بار دیگر رویا را در جاده می بینند. این بار، رویا واقعیت زندگی خود را برای رضا و سیاوش میگوید، خستگی ماجراهای آن روز، نقل رویدادهای تلخ و ناگوار زندگی رویا چنان دو جوان را خسته و مکدر و افسرده میکند که در ویلا در فاصله کوتاهی به خواب می روند اما فردای آن روز وقتی از خواب بیدار می شوند اثری از رویا نمی بینند.
Content_2: When best friends Reza and Siavash pick up a mysterious, deadly young woman on the north road out of the city, they cannot hope to comprehend the chilling events that are to follow them on their journey. Caught up in a strange calamitous world, one preceded by a terrible accident in the past, the friends find themselves alone in the forest with their enigmatic passenger and the heart of a perplexing mystery in this gripping, twisting drama.Reza who drives a taxi for a living, picks up Siavash who is a friend of him from childhood. After talking about the past for a while, they decide to go on a picnic for the sake of the good old days. Along their way, they pick up a girl named Roya who they know nothing about. Roya has run away from her house after a fierce fight with her family and murdering somebody. They try to flirt with Roya but she acts so cold that they are both disappointed. They go to a villa near the sea which belongs to one of Siavash's relatives. Roya tries to commit suicide and takes a lot of pills at once which put her to sleep. A sleep so deep that the boys think that she's dead and decide to bury her somewhere in the yard. They eventually find out that she's alive and take her to a hospital. Reza introduces himself as Roya's brother. When Roya wakes up she runs away from the hospital. Reza and Siavash start heading back to the villa, but they meet Roya on the road again and this time she tells them her life story. The tiredness of the day and the sorrowful story that Roya has told them puts them to sleep, but when they get up, there is no sign of Roya.

'First Grade' is the story of Javad, an only child who must stay with with his great aunt Zivar for two days while his parents attend a relative's funeral out of town. Alone with only his aunt and his two lovebirds for company, Javad is initially reluctant to stay. But as he starts to bond with his aunt as he heads to and from school each day, he quickly discovers there's more to her than his first impression, and even begins to enjoy her company. A sweet and gentle film about family bonding and the hidden qualities in everyone.

Content_1: اين فيلم براي معرفي هرچه بهتر صادق هدايت نويسنده آشناي ايراني و تحليلي بر آثارش كه مهمترين آن ها «بوف كور» است به شيوه مستند داستاني ساخته شده است.
Content_2: Docudrama about the works of Sadegh Hedayat, acclaimed Iranian writer, poet and intellectual, focusing on the resounding influence of Western culture in his life. As the benevolent shadow of Sadegh walks us through growing up in Tehran, his fascination with movies like 'Nosferatu' and 'Dracula', his later writings and battles with censorship, we are treated to an intimate insight into one of the most prolific literary minds of the twentieth century. Resounding and entrancing.

Content_1: در حالی که تنها سه روز به آغاز برگزاری جشنواره فیلم فجر باقی مانده است، فیلمی که خسرو آن را ساخته، همچنان در مرحله صداگذاری است، فرسودگی دستگاه های فنی، قطع و وصل مدام برق، آماده نبودن موسیقی متن و خستگی عوامل فنی که به طور شبانه روزی مشغول به کار هستند، موجب پدید آمدن فضایی پر تنش و عصبی شده، ضمن این که تهیه کننده هم لحظه به لحظه فشار بیشتری را برای آماده شدن فیلم به خسرو وارد می کند. سرانجام فشار بیش از اندازه کار، خسرو را دچار جنون می کند و تصمیم میگیرد تا همه چیز را به هم بریزد، امّا افراد گروه او رابه یک صندلی میبندند و کار را ادامه می دهند. گروه همه در تلاشند تا فیلم، حتی در آخرین لحظه به جشنواره رسانده شود، آنان کوشش های بی امانی را برای انجام آخرین مراحل فنی فیلم آغاز می کنند و به رغم مشکلات، سرانجام فیلم را به جشنواره می رسانند. اما بازتاب آن نزد مخاطبان، با وقفه هایی که در نمایشش، برای رساندن حلقه های بعدی فیلم از استودیو به سالن، پیش می آید ناامیدکننده است.
Content_2: Esteemed film director Khosrow leads his crew in a race to complete post-production on their latest film in time for the end of the Fajr Film Festival. This extraordinary film treats the audience to a behind-the-scenes look at how sound is created for film, often with comedic and even touching results. As we follow Khosrow on his quest, it becomes clear that while he starts to question his own directing abilities, he will stop at nothing to complete his work, even at the cost of his health. This atmospheric film’s documentary-like format and contemplative use of narration immerses us into Khosrow’s world and the fascinating process of Iranian film-making.While it’s only three days left to the opening of The Fajr Film Festival, the movie that Khosrow has made is still at the dubbing point because of the many troubles they’re facing. The pressures on Khosrow drive him crazy and he decides to wreck everything down, but the crew stop him and tie him to a chair and then continue to do their job to make it to the festival. Despite all the difficulties, they actually do succeed but they don’t get good feedback from the audience because at the time of the display of the film, there were long pauses when the film stock was supposed to be changed.

Content_1: مطابق وصیت خان جان، باغ و عمارت وی در آب اسک که به صورت مشاع بین دو طایفه، کشتگر، و اشوان وقف شده، تا زمانی که فرزندان دو خانواده با هم وصلت کنند در تصرف این دو طایفه خواهد بود و در غیر این صورت، حق تصرف ملک از خانواده کشتگر ساقط و به خانواده شوان منتقل میشود. مهتا، دختر میرزاحسن کشتگر، که به تازگی در آزمون ورودی دانشکده پزشکی قبول شده، همه اهالی روستا را شاد میکند به جز ملوس خانم زن عمویش، که پسرش برزو چند سال دیگر باید در انتظار پایان تحصیل مهتا برای ازدواج با او بماند. در جشنی که برای مهتا گرفته می شود ملوس خانم سعی می کند تا حلقه ازدواج را به مهتا بدهد اما حلقه از انگشتش خارج نمی شود و در نتیجه مهتاب اعلام می کند که به شرط درآمدن انگشت از دست ملوس خانم، حاضر به ازدواج با برز و خواهد شد. دو خانواده، آماده مراسم نامزدی می شوند. اما تماس تلفنی مردی با مهتا، همه را به شک می اندازد. مرد که سرایدار یکی از بازماندگان نرگس خاتون (زنی که به دلیل ابراز عشق به یک مرد و انتخاب شوهر بدون واسطه فامیل در سالها قبل تکفیر شده) است و مهتا حاضر نیست درباره اش توضیح بدهد و انتظار دارد خانواده خود و عمویش به او اطمینان داشته باشند. البته برزو که قبلاً با مهتا برای دیدن بازماندگان نرگس خاتون به شهر رفته، از موضوع مطلع است و دلیل تماس تلفنی را که تعمیر سنگ قبر پوسیده ی نرگس خاتون است را میداند... در روز سنتی حکومت زنان روستا، که طی آن مردان برای ذخیره کردن برف در یک انبار بزرگ به خارج از روستا می روند، اختلاف و بدبینی به اوج میرسد. در این روز وقتی سرایدار به روستا می آید ملوس خانم و دخترش با کمک دیگر اهالی او را کتک زده و مجروح می کنند، اما مهتا از سرایدار و همچنین نرگس خاتون که از اجداد خودش هستند دفاع میکند. حاکم شهر زنان نیز سرانجام پس از سالها از تصمیم او برای انتخاب آینده اش تقدیر میکند... حالا مهتا، خود برای آینده اش تصمیم می گیرد تا سر راه جوانان روستا قرار گیرد که توسط یکی از آنها انتخاب شود، اما برزو قبل از بقیه ی پسران جوان، سر راه او حاضر می شود و مهتا که از قبل انتظارش را داشته، دسته گل خود را به او می دهد تا ازدواج آنها سر بگیرد...
Content_2: Centering upon a community of women who have divided themselves from men, 'City Of Women' explores themes of female strength and individual freedom. In an attempt to end the feud between the Keshtgar and Shavan families, Khan Jan decrees that unless the children of the two families marry, the Keshtgars will be forbidden from using the family garden at Ab Ask and the Shavans will retain control of the properties. When the daughter of the Keshtgars, Mahtab, gets accepted into university, she takes it upon herself to fight this ridiculous law and unite the families by other means. Compelling drama from Ataollah Hayati about the complications brought about by the separation of the sexes. Essential viewing.According to Khan Jan’s will, his garden and mansion which are both located in Ab Ask, belong to the Keshtgar and Ashvan families as long as their children are married to each other, otherwise the Keshtgar family has no rights to these properties and they entierly belong to the Ashvan family. Mahta, the daughter of Mirza Hassan Keshtgar, is accepted to med school and all the villagers are happy for her, except her uncle’s wife Malous Khanoum, whose son Borzou now has to wait for her to finish med school and then marry her. While they celebrate Mahta’s success, Malous Khanoum tries to give the engagement ring to her but she can’t take it off of her finger. Mahta claims that she will marry Borzou provided the ring comes off of Malous Khanoum’s finger. While the two families are preparing for the engagement ceremony, a phone call makes everything seem suspicious. The man calling Mahta is the janitor working for one of Narges Khatoun’s relatives. Narges Khatoun was a highly loathed and hated woman because she had decided to choose a man she truly loved as her husband and disregarded her family’s disapproval. Mahta does not intend to explain the situation and expects her family and her uncle to trust and respect her. Borzou however, has traveled with Mahta to the city before and knows who Narges Khatoun’s relative is and also knows the reason of the phone call, which is restoring Narges Khatoun’s decayed tombstone. While men are away loading snow into a large depot as a tradition, the janitor arrives in the village and the tension rises up. Malous Khanoum and her daughter and some of the other inhabitants beat and wound him. Mahta however takes the janitor and Narges Khatoun’s side, who are actually her ancestors. The governor of the city of women encourages Mahta to make decisions for herself on her own. Now that she has full control of her own life, she intends to choose a young groom among the villagers and marry him, but Borzou proves himself before anybody else does as Mahta expected, so she gives him the flowers and they marry each other.

In this compelling drama, Fatemeh lives under the same roof as her daughter and mother. Fatemeh hopes to find her daughter a suitor soon, while also considering her own views on marriage. As Fatemeh struggles to keep her car business afloat while caring for her ailing elderly mother, she learns that the three must work together to face obstacles.

Content_1: رسول، با زنی به نام بتول و پسرش تصادف می كند و وقتی آنها را به بیمارستان می رساند متوجه می شود كه زن دچار فراموشی شده. زهره همسر رسول، به بیمارستان می آید و از زن مراقبت می كند. زهره و بتول با هم صمیمی می شوند و چون بتول كسی را ندارد او را به خانه رسول می برند. زهره پس از مدتی...
Content_2: Following a car accident, a man takes in the woman he knocked down with his car along with her young son as an act of kindness. Entering his family home and befriending his wife, it seems that preceding events may not have been as accidental as once thought. This tense thriller leads us down a rabbit hole of deceit and obsession.

Content_1: نیروهای دو جبهه، پس از یک عملیات ایذایی، خسته، افتان و خیزان، در سنگرها مستقر می شوند، آنها از فرط تشنگی در هوای گرم و آفتاب سوزان با مرگ دست به گریبانند، این در حالی است که حوضچه آبی در بین آنها قرار دارد، اما هیچ یک از نیروهای خسته دو جبهه نبرد، از بیم جبهه مقابل یارای نزدیک شدن به حوضچه را ندارند، نیروها که هرکدام در گوشه ای، دقایق آرام پس از یک نبرد جانانه را میگذرانند و غوطه ور افکار خود برای حال و آینده هستند. مهران که در جریان نبرد یک پایش را از دست داده، نگرانی اش را با همرزم پیرتر از خودش حافظ که بیخیال ترو پرتحرک تر از همرزم جوان است در مورد زمان بازگشت و مواجهه با نامزدش را، با او در میان میگذارد. حافظ معتقد اسست خانم ها روحيه لطيف و مهربانی دارند، قطعاً به خاطر مشکلی که برای او پیش آمده، ترکش نخواهد کرد، امّا مهران که معتقد است در شرایطی که او به هزار کلک و بدبختی، نامزدش را قانع کرده بود تا با او عروسی کند، دیگر دلیلی برای او وجود ندارد که با مردی که یک پا ندارد، حاضر به ازدواج باشد. کمی دورتر از ذهن مشغول و مستأصل مهران، جنگ با شدت و حدت ادامه دارد.
Content_2: Set during the Iran-Iraq War, 'Big Drum Under Left Foot' tells the story of a group of battleworn Iranian soldiers who become trapped in a trench on the frontline. In desperate need of water, and swiftly running out of options, one of them, Mehran, decides to make his way to the only spring in the region, which is dangerously located between the frontlines. Desperate to survive, and with the situation worsened by the war raging all around them, an incidental meeting between the two sides escalates out of control. Actions will be questioned and alliances will fracture in this reflective wartime drama.After a military deception, the soldiers from both sides get tired and settle in their trenches. They fight death as they struggle to survive despite fatal thirst. Although there is a pond between them, no one dares to approach for fear of the other front. All of them are immersed in their thoughts after the battle and think about their present and future. Mehran, who has lost one of his legs during the battle, shares his concern about going back and meeting his fiancée with an older fellow soldier, Hafez, who is more carefree and active than Mehran. Hafez believes women have kind souls and she definitely won't leave him for what has happened to him. Mehran thinks she will have no reason anymore to marry a one-legged man. A little further from Mehran's busy and desperate mind, the battle is going on strongly.

'This Is Not an Accident' is a fast-paced film about a man who causes an accident and cowardly flees the crime scene. With guilt slowly engulfing him, he decides to take action. Disguising himself with a surgical mask, he sneaks into the hospital where the victims are being treated. He begins to help the family of the victims. However, is this real charity or is he simply looking for evidence that could be used against him? This compelling drama looks at the differences between hero and villain.

Content_1: طی مراسم عقد، عروس به جای بله می‌گوید نه و داستان از اینجا شروع می‌شود. داماد همه‌ی تلاش خود را می‌کند تا بتواند از عروس جواب بله بگیرد، اما موفق نمی‌شود. در یک تغییر غیرمنتظره عروس تبدیل به شخص دیگری می‌شود و جست‌وجوی داماد برای برگرداندن او اتفاقات تازه‌ای را رقم می‌زند.
Content_2: This comedic tale of a pair of lovable rogues thrown together by their insatiable appetites for stealing focuses on Naser, a petty thief who steals anything he can, be it hubcaps, stereos, or just about anything he can get his hands on. One day, a theft takes an unexpected turn when he opens a car door to find Davood, another would-be thief. After some bickering, the pair decide to steal the car together. When Naser subsequently meets Davood's sister, a romance begins to bloom. Davood, meanwhile, contends with his old flame, Mojgan. A blend of romance, humor, and drama, this movie has something for everyone.

Content_1: پرویز رئیس انجمن گدایان , سیامک را جهت اداره امور این انجمن انتخاب می کند . با ورود مریم دختر برادر پرویز از خارج از کشور به ایران , سیامک عاشق او می شود ولی خسرو دور از چشم سیامک سعی دارد او را از میدان به در کند...
Content_2: In Tehran, a community of beggars, under the control of Parviz (Dariush Asadzadeh), give him their takings in the streets in exchange for protection. His right hand man leads the beggars in the south side of the city in their daily pursuits. As Parviz' niece returns to the city to make a documentary about the beggars, she and her uncle's protege strike up a friendship. A whimsical yet poignant adventure drama.

Content_1: ایرج که همراه همسرش نرگس و پسرشان آرش در خانه ای اجاره ای زندگی می کند، نامه ای دریافت می کند که در آن بچه ای بیمار از او کمک خواسته است. ایرج این نامه را شوخی تلقی می کند و همراه دایی با اتومبیلش به طرف شمال حرکت می کند و زمانی که از یک تونل می گذرند خود را در فضایی غریب و روبروی کلبه ای می یابند و برای فرار از باران شدید به درون کلبه می روند که کسی در آن نیست ولی مدتی بعد میهمانان دیگری سر و کله شان پیدا می شود....ایرج و همسرش نرگس وپسرشان آرش که به همراه دایی عازم شمال هستند، بعد از عبور از یک تونل، زیر بارش شدید باران، خود را در فضایی غریب و برابر کلبه ای می یابند. به زودی میهمانان دیگری هم به کلبه میرسند. ببعی (بره سفید)، کلاغ، مرغ، خروس، گاو،الاغ .ایرج توسط الاغ که خود را پدرخوانده ببعی میداند، مطلع می شود نامه ای که او مبنی بر درخواست کودکی بیمار دریافت داشته، در واقع مربوط به ببعی است که همیشه در آرزوی دیدن خاله پیرزن است تا جای خالی مادرش را پر کند و حالا از دوری او بیمار شده است و اینک همه تصمیم دارند تا به او کمک کنند. اما همه میدانند تنها درمان او دیدن خاله پیرزن است . ایرج که همه حیوانات را به خانه خود برده است، تصویری خیالی از خاله پیرزن نقاشی کرده و بر در و دیوار شهر می چسباند اما به زودی حال ببعی وخیم می شود، او را به بیمارستان می رسانند و در حالی که همه فکر میکنند که بیعی مرده است، با آمدن خاله پیرزن بر بالین او، حال بره کوچک نیز خوب می شود.
Content_2: In 'Once upon a time,' ('Yeki Bood Yeki Nabood', 2000), a magical letter transports two men, Fahrad and Iraj, to a small house in the middle of the countryside - and into a world that's filled with cute talking animals.The men are happy to go along with it, but when the animals follow them back to the city, there are much bigger problems to solve. A delightful film for young children.Iraj, along with his wife, Narges, his son, Arash, and his uncle are travelling to the North. After crossing a tunnel, while there's a heavy rainfall, they find themselves in a strange and cozy hut. Soon, other guests arrive too: A white sheep, a raven, a chicken, a cock, a cow, and a donkey. The donkey who introduces himself as the sheep's stepfather, informs Iraj that the letter he had received from a sick child is actually from the sheep who has always had the dream of seeing the old woman so that she can be as his dead mom. Now that the sheep has become ill because of the distance between them, everyone is determined to help her. But they all know that her only cure is to see the old woman. Iraj, who has taken all the animals to his house, paints a fictional picture of the old woman and attaches it to the walls of the city. But the sheep soon gets sick, and is taken to the hospital. While everyone thinks that the sheep is dead, she gets recovered once the old woman comes to see her.

Content_1: اسد، قالپاق دزد، در جهت ارتقاء شغلی خود، عليرغم مخالفت روح مادرش، به ماشین دزدی روی می کند. در صندوق اولین ماشینی که سرقت می کند، مردی زخمی با نام «هادی زاده» قرار دارد که مدیر عامل یک شرکت معتبر گوشت است!.... هادی زاده مصمم است تا علت و عاملان ربوده شدن خود را شناسایی کند، پس اسد را مأمور می کند تا به خانه اش رفته و استاد و پول های او را بیاورد. امّا اسد توسط دختر هادی زاده - که نامش «دخی» است - دستگیر می شود. به کمک روح مادر اسد، دخی و پدرش با هم رو به رو می شوند و قرارها گذاشته می شود و اسد هم آزاد می شود.  از این پس تا مدتی همه افراد فامیل، دوستان و کارکنان شرکت زیر نظر گرفته می شوند و بالاخره مظنون اصلی شناسایی می شود و او «چوپان زاده» مالک شرکت تولید گوشت و صدور پوست و روده، رقیب سرسخت «هادی زاده » است که اصلاً نابیناست!...  در این مرحله ، هادی زاده به محل کار خود بازگشته و ربوده شدن خود را انکار می کند، همه ظاهراً از بازگشت او شادمان هستند، از جمله چوپان زاده و پسرش «کامپیز» - که به «دخی» علاقه مند است و خواستار ازدواج با اوست... «هادی زاده » در دومین مرحله نقشه اش، ورود عنقریب یک فرد انگلیسی با نام « مستر آنجلیان» را برای عقد قراردادهای سودآور، شایع می کند. «اسد» بعد از تلاش «دخی» برای اینکه، به یک جنتلمن انگلیسی تبدیل شود، در هتل ساکن می گردد و با کمک روح مادرش پیش می رود... چوپان زاده و پسرش برای جلب نظر مستر آنجلیان، وارد عرصه می شوند و با تدابیری که از قبل اندیشیده شده، تصمیم ها به نفع «هادی زاده» تمام می شود. چوپان زاده و کامبیز، که از نتیجه کار راضی نیستند، تصمیم می گیرند تا مستر آنجلیان را بدزدند، روح مادر اسد، آنها را آگاه می کند، امّا نهایتاً دخی هم کنار اسد گرفتار می شود. اسد با کمک روح مادرش دخی را نجات می دهد. اما توسط چوپان زاده و عواملش از پای در می آید. و به روح مادرش می پیوندد. دخی بر سر جنازه ی او می گرید اما روح اسد خوشحال با روح مادرش برای قالپاق دزدی در جهان دیگر همراه می شود...
Content_2: Asad (Shahram Haghigat Doost) is being plagued by the nuisance ghost of his dead mother and, in his attempt to escape her, sets in motion a series of hilarious events. As he tries to rob a house, he is caught by the homeowner, who then follows him on his wacky adventures. Lighthearted comedy with zany results.Tardast is a hilarious comedy about theft, a mother's ghost, love and jeolousy. Asad, a petty thief of hubcaps, decides to earn more money from stealing. To do so, he starts car theft however, his mom is totally against all this and is mortified to find her son a car thief. He finds a man called Hadizadeh, wounded and injured, in the car boot of the first car he robs. Hadizadeh, who owns a reputable meat products company, is firm in his decision to find his kidnapper. He needs his legal documents and money, and to get them, he sends Asad to fetch them. To do so, when Asad goes to Hadizadeh's place, he is imprisoned by Hadizadeh's daughter, Dokhi. Now, quite miraculously, Asad's mother's ghost pops up. She has come to Asad's help in fact. The mother's ghost arranges by magic for Dokhi and her father to meet together. Asad is finally released from Dokhi's prison. Hadizadeh, who is still looking for his kidnapper, is suspicious of everyone, even his family and relatives. Hadizadeh can finally meet his kidnapper after many schemes and plans. The kidnapper proves to be his life long enemy and rival. He is blind and owns a meats products factory too, and has always been jealous of Hadizadeh's wealth and success. When Hadizadeh returns to his company and does not tell anybody that he was kidnapped, everybody seems happy and content to see him back. Choopanzadeh, the rival and kidnapper, has a son named Kambiz who is passionately in love with Dokhi and would like to marry her. On his second scheme to find his kidnapper, Hadizadeh makes everyone believe that an English gentleman is coming to visit his company to sign highly profitable contracts. Hadizadeh is doing so to arouse his enemy's jealousy in order to find out who his rival is. With Dokhi's assistance, Asad disguises as an English gentleman called Mr. Angelian and hides in a hotel room and is guided by his mother's ghost. Choopanzadeh and his son Kambiz try hard to poach the so-called English gentleman, but their efforts come to no avail. Discontent and agitated, Choopanzadeh and Kambiz kidnap the English gentleman (Asad). Asad's mother's ghost informs Dokhi and Asad of the plan and Asad manages to run away but they get their hands on Dokhi and kidnap her. Asad's mother's ghost and Asad help to release Dokhi. When Asad is trying to release Dokhi, he dies and his ghost (comically) joins his mom. They both start stealing hubcaps in the other world.

Content_1: سه پسر خانواده بعد از فوت پدرشان با وصیت نامه ای روبرو می شوند که خانه ی پدریشان را به شخصی ناشناس به نام جواد انبار بخشید و جستجوی آنها برای و
Content_2: Family comedy following the lives of three sons after the death of their father. When it is revealed during the reading of the will that a mysterious Javad has inherited the house, the three siblings seek to track him down and expose a family secret that has lain hidden for years.

'Tehran, Nature in a Coma' whisks you away to the past so you can witness how Tehran has developed throughout the ages from the perspective of agriculture, farming and animals – traversing through what was, and still is, an enormous part of Iranian society. A documentary that presents just how essential and life-changing the development of crop farming was to Tehran and the wider region. A fascinating historical journey of man and nature.

A series of 49 documentary films by 31 filmmakers, Children of the Land of Iran provides a window into the traditions, rituals and people within the rich and diverse culture of Iran.   In Khorasan, there are around 300 small and large Kurdish Kormanj tribes who live in various areas in the region. During the Safavid era, these tribes were moved on several occasions from the west of Iran to Khorasan. Now these tribes make up an important part of the region. Bahram Azimpour’s 'My Tribe, Kormanj' provides fascinating insight into the cultural traditions of the Kormanji, spanning 20 years. The documentary specifically follows the lives, work and celebrations of women and children of the Kormanj tribe in the Dargaz region. A film that relies heavily on its cinematography to unlock a hidden world through rarely seen footage, 'My Tribe Kormanj' is not to be missed.

Saeed Hadadi's short film provides footage of the yearly ceremony honoring one of Shia Islam's great religious leaders, Imam Hossain, who was martyred around 1400 years ago. Using dynamic sound editing and clever camera work, 'The Ceremony' spans the day's celebration, capturing the atmospheres of bustling crowds, musical performances and chanting alike while managing to evoke the deeper meanings of the ritual.

A unique take on the Iraq war, most notably for its subject matter; we are presented with an American perspective of events. In candid interviews with U.S. veterans and their relatives, this film pieces together Iran's relationship with Iraq, as witnessed by the American soldiers who served. Boasting stunning aerial shots and crisp cinematography, this documentary is a lesson on how the mentalities of nations are perceived by outsiders.

A 26-year-old filmmaker Mona Zahed ventures to Afghanistan on a journey to experience and witness a dangerous environment of war. The documentary starts by Mona looking at footage from the Iran-Iraq war on its anniversary in 2001, briefly explaining the purpose of this documentary. As Mona and her crew cross the border into Afghanistan, she begins a journey of discovery and knowledge. Throughout the journey, Mona manages to conduct a series of interviews from the Taliban to the citizens of Afghanistan. What makes this film interesting is Mona's courageous attitude, as she is unafraid to ask controversial questions and confront anyone in her way to acquire the answers she seeks.

A series of 49 documentary films by 31 filmmakers, Children of the Land of Iran provides a window into the traditions, rituals and people within the rich and diverse culture of Iran.  This documentary welcomes us to the Kurdish region of Hawraman, located in Kermanshah in Western Iran, beginning with stunning shots of its mountainous landscape and its native wildlife. With only minor dialogue to camera from three men of differing generations, the film is generally observational, allowing the area and customs to speak for themselves. The footage initially explores the vast wealth of the region, before moving on to more diverse territory.

When a fire devastates an elementary school in a rural village, many children are left with catastrophic burn injuries. Suffering from sever skin and organ damage, the young victims bravely come forward to share their recollections of that dreadful day. A harrowing documentary that highlights the courage of youngsters who try to resume normality despite their circumstances.

As industrial factories increasingly replace the demand for handmade textiles, this documentary reflects on the dying art of weaving. A tradition with a 6 thousand year history in Iran, and surrounded by a rich mythology, Reza Erfani Zaboli and Hossein Rasti's film laments the modern decline of weaving fabrics. Beautifully shot images of looms and textiles add emphasise to the loss of artistic creativity brought about by industrial production, while first hand reports from weavers bring an air of sadness and invoke a desire to keep the tradition alive.

EN_title: She is A Man, He is A Woman
PENGLISH_title: Ou Yek Mard va Ou Yek Zan
PERSIAN_title: او یک مرد و او یک زن
Content_2: This documentary explores the thoughts and emotions of Iran's transvestites and examines the issues around family and society. It also has interesting interviews with doctors who help with the sex changes.

With characteristic depth of knowledge and artistic vision, Khosrow Sinai sheds light on the origin and progress of the modern art movement in Iran. Beginning with the vital introduction of cubism to Iran in the 1940s, Sinai follows the paths of the pioneers that made the Modern Movement possible. Exploring the work of these artists, and providing insights into their inspirations and typical subject matter, the film is a must see for anyone interested in art.

EN_title: The Children Play in the Marsh
PENGLISH_title: Bache Ha Dar Hur Bazi Mikonand
PERSIAN_title: بچه ها در هور بازی می کنند
Content_2: A series of 49 documentary films by 31 filmmakers, Children of the Land of Iran provides a window into the traditions, rituals and people within the rich and diverse culture of Iran.  Filmed on and arround a single body of water, this documentary portrays a single community as they live off the land and river. Accompanied by an evocative musical score and narrated by children, it follows the enjoyments and habits of men, women and children as they go through their daily life.

This moving documentary short looks at the impoverished existence of a community of Iranian heroin addicts. Whilst the men inject in one room of their dilapidated accommodation, and the women smoke in another, they are visited daily by a group of charity workers who provide them with clean equipment. Most are infected with HIV, including one of the workers who was attacked with a contaminated glass bottle. Elsewhere, the women seek advice and medical assistance from a local sexual health clinic. Simple shots and natural light serve to emphasize the stark circumstances.

"World's Children" is Hamed Saadet's honest and refreshing exploration of the lives of young Afghan refugees in Iran. The film captures the difficult nature of the children's experience with a vivid poignancy, as they are largely rejected by Iranian society and deprived of essential documentation such as ID cards. Yet, focusing on a school set up to teach Afghan children, it also shows the joy and refuge they can find in education when they are provided with it.

A short documentary about a gamer who must find an appropriate game for his nephew who has come to stay with him. Under his own criteria, the game must be suitable for his nephew's vast amount of energy, suitable for play in apartments and also Iranian. As the filmmaker strives to find the perfect game for his nephew, he finds that he not only underestimates his young friend, but that their cultural touchstones aren't the same at all. Switching from genre to genre, coming across massively multiplayer online games and finding war games, released years ago, that seem to predict current conflicts between the U.S and the Middle East.

Mohammad Khalilzadeh's documentary follows sociology student Farzi Nejad, his professor Dr Patrov, and fellow student Golbano, as they conduct intimate research into Iran's Gilan Province. As he travels through Gilan's mountainous terrain, meeting its people and immersing himself in its culture, Farzi learns broadly about the social history, traditions and agricultural customs of the region. However, the special focus of the film is on the Alam-Vachini ceremony performed there, and a bonfire gathering held before it which celebrates fire as a sign God's cleansing power. These scenes, alongside Farzi's commentary, provide a fascinating insight into a beautiful area of Iran.

Filmed during the time of the Reform Movement in the late 1990s, this documentary explores the lives of Iranian students. As different students narrate their life stories, interests and views of the political landscape in Iran, a fascinating portrait of the period begins to emerge. Pirooz Kalantari's film is an excellent examination of what it means to be a student in post-1979 Iran.

Khosrow Sinai was commissioned by the National Bank of Iran to produce a documentary about the national jewelry collection. His final product, 'Witnesses of History', has some stunning visuals of the collection. Accompanied by Sinai's voiceover, the images offer up to the audience Iran's finest gems, which have indeed witnessed Iran's tumultuous history.

This documentary centers around a park, its visitors and their various habits. The narrator tells the story of the park and examines the ways in which it is used as a public space, including a variety of scenes with people relaxing, exercising and walking. A simple but immersive look into how humans interact with their surroundings.

A human interest, society documentary, directed by Mohammad H Jafari, 'Green Card' recalls the story of one's upbringing in Afghanistan and how the current and political climate affects individual opportunities. The passenger in this documentary, travels around the country, making discoveries about the welfare of individuals in society. A documentary which values the importance of individuals being persistent in life to make the most out of success.

The Iranian government plans to make Tehran one of the most luxurious cities in the world. This documentary follows a group of local architects, employed to devise a new building for a retail shopping center in an attempt to bring business to the area. Through collaboration with the passionate locals, the is creating a capital that will be considered one of the most beautiful in the world. Director Khosrow Sinai delights with this optimistic documentary on the future plans for Tehran.

'Don't Forget Our Date' is a thoughtful insight into the life of a musician. Our protagonist is the look-a-like of famous pop star, Nadin. We accompany him through his jam sessions, music production, studio recordings and even a trip to the barber. Director Katayoun Arsanjani indulges us with an affectionate look at the creative process of an 'almost' pop icon.

Khosrow Sinai's short film revolves around the work of Farah Ossouli, an artist who invents symbolic characters and stories in order to express her views about life. Depicting her characters in expertly composed and beautifully coloured paintings, which blend a traditional Persian painting style with a modern touch, Farah Ossouli's art has been exhibited internationally and is deservedly award-winning. Here, it is given a new dimension through pantomime and poetic narrative. As the film follows Ossouli creating a new work, dramatic performances pieces bring her characters to life in a surreal blend of fly-on-the-wall observation and symbolic imagery.

Directors Katayoun Arsanjani and Pooyan Shahrokhi highlight the thriving coffee shop culture that has increased in popularity every Friday after prayers. This ritual has become a central hub of activity, discussion and community. 'Coffee After Friday Pray' is an intriguing look into how religion plays an integral part in social interaction in contemporary Iran.

Filmed at a teacher-parent open day at a school promoting progressive teaching methods, Hamid Reza Ghotbi's documentary is a thought-provoking reflection on how Iran's education system might be changed for the better. While the school's philosophy aims to provide a creative environment as a means towards more productive learning, teachers and parents talk about a broad spectrum of issues. How to deal with unruly children, rewarding success, learning facilities, and the need for teachers to emotional engage with pupils, are just some of the issues up for debate in this short film committed to improving Iranian schools.

Sohrab Khosravi's short documentary provides a glimpse into the life of Hojat Ghazvini, who at the age of 40 gave up his life in society to live alone in the desert. Filmed in 2000, the then 55 year-old Hojat reflects on his reasons for giving up his first life and being 'born again' to live a second life. The film provides intriguing footage of his daily life, while Hojat tells accounts of the dangers he has faced and talks about his philosophical views.

'Tehran, the Lost City' (Tehran, Shahre Gomshodeh) is a documentary about the development of Tehran city, and the criticism of the industrialisation which has led to Tehran losing its identity as a place for traditional architecture. This documentary takes the audience to the oldest parts of Tehran to show appreciation of the architecture that has lasted throughout the years.

'Half-Life Nature' is a documentary criticizing the progress of industrialization in Tehran, and charting the correlation of such industrialization with the destruction of nature. In a condemnation of the speed in which Tehran is becoming more and more urbanized, the film covers an array of the environmental issues blighting the city's wildlife and human populations. Noise, deforestation, pollution, and the resulting decline of the bird population all come under fire in Omid Abdollahi's awareness-rousing short.

Amir Hossein Birjandi's ode to the disappearing old houses of a Tehran neighborhood is a history lesson on a form of architecture being encroached upon by urban modernisation. With beautifully shot images of the streets and buildings of the city and a poetic voice-over, together with expert interviews, this is a snapshot of a neglected part of Tehran’s architectural heritage.

Sound is utilised to breathtaking effect in this documentary by Mohammed Afarideh about the trappings of modern day city-life in Tehran. A split-frame is also used to express the city's transformation as it passes through the decades. 'Symphony of the City' begins with grainy black and white footage of camel-drawn carriages and low stone buildings. This cuts to a beautiful sweeping shot of the skyscrapers of modern Tehran. A cacophony of noises flood in, from the incessant beeping of traffic jams to the jarring screech of hydraulic drills. This film effectively questions the intrusive levels of noise that have caused health problems amongst residents on Tehran, critiquing the processes of industrialization and modernization.

A fascinating and often heart-warming documentary providing an insight into the making of the awarded-winning film 'Niloofar'. In 'Recipe of Niloofar', director Sabine El Gemayel gives an insight into the making of her successful film, taking the audience into the intimate process of writing and directing. Not just for fans of the original feature, this is a wonderful documentary of creative collaboration, showing the smooth interactions of an international team of filmmakers within a backdrop of the good-natured people of Iran.  Synopsis by IMVBox

Mohammad Reza Fartousi's eye-opening documentary focuses on young photographer Nadia Abdullah's brave efforts to record social unrest in Yemen. Using Abdullah's powerful and often disturbing images to capture the atmosphere of revolution, the film follows her as she works while providing insights into her personal aims and thoughts on photography. First inspired to document the revolution by the horror of seeing innocent people wounded in a hospital, she talks passionately about the corrupt politics of Yemen, her experience of witnessing bloodshed, and what she sees as the revolutionary art of photography.

This documentary sheds light on the extraordinary pilgrimage taken by many to Shah Ahmad's shrine. Consisting of a series of 9 different ceremonies, starting at Mount Kibar, the ritual is performed by multitudes of devoted pilgrims every year. Attracted by Ahmad's miracles, and the esoteric beauty of the landscape in which the pilgrimage takes place, this film records the followers of the legendary figure on their sacred journey.

Mehdi Ghorbanpour's documentary is a look at the varying aspirations of several young people from different backgrounds. Some dream of making films, some want to train as musicians and others seek to further their academic studies. Some have to take exams, others work tiring jobs while continuing to believe in their dreams. The film follows this emerging generation of Iranians and wonders what will become of their futures.

Khosrow Sinai's documentary is a unique tribute to the great nation of Iran, as seen from the eyes of its international tourist trade. Cutting together fly-on-the-wall and interview footage of people from different countries around the world during the 1960s and 1970s, the film provides a broad but intimate insight into how visitors have enjoyed Iran. From guided tours, trekking around the country and revelling in Iranian music to footage of the global diversity of tourists at the airport, the experience of Iran through foreign eyes is given a vivid and aspirational representation here.

Yousef Nikfam's documentary reveals the tradition of Shovel Moving, a ceremonial celebration performed in Nimevar in the Markazi province of Iran. Delving into the tradition's history, and the various competitions and performances which make up the yearly celebration, the film is an interesting look at the way in which a community can come together through ceremony.

'South of Iran' is a documentary series that details the evolution of Southern Iranian music, while explaining how it was influenced by various cultures throughout history. It also provides insight into how the instruments developed. This episode explores music which is played during special ceremonies which are held to pacify the noban - a harmful wind which is associated with spirit possession beliefs among people from the Southern coastal regions of Iran. Among other things, the ceremony consists of playing a specific beat of drums.

Opening with scenes from a sunset fishing trip, Katayoun Arsanjani takes us into an unknown world. Split between direct interviews with portions of city life shot from a hidden camera, we are granted access to intimate conversations with the working people that inhabit the city. 'My Share From Khazar' contrasts the beauty of nature, namely the sea, with the daily grind and urban grit of city life.

Mohammed H. Jafari's thought-provoking documentary follows the lives of Laleh and Laden, twins conjoined at the head, as they contemplate surgical separation. Heart-breaking and heart-warming by turns, the film provides an intimate insight into the personal interaction of the twins and their reasons for wanting the life-threatening operation. Yet as Laleh and Laden’s hopes and fears for the future are delicately revealed, Jafari also explores the wider moral dilemma of how two inseparable people are to be understood by the law.

Khosrow Sinai's documentary is a loving tribute to Tehran, delving into the city's history and commenting on the nature of modern life there. From famous architectural landmarks to winding back alleys, from Tehran's theatre culture and museum treasures to congested traffic and quiet parks, Sinai glances everywhere with a thoughtful and adoring eye. But he also lets the city do its own talking, providing a rich array of visual imagery which beautifully conveys the diversity of Tehran’s people and places.

Documentary centering on a huge sculpture of Shah Abbas in Isfahan, which along with all other statues was torn down after the Islamic Revolution. Interviewing the masterpiece's creator Iraj Mohammadi and other important figures surrounding the issue, the film debates the relevance of statues to a city’s cultural heritage and the socio-political history of Isfahan and the Revolution. While it's unknown what happened to his statue, Mohammadi also talks about his unending search for it as the film recounts the stories that surround its mysterious disappearance.

Alireza Karami's documentary looks at the life and career of Professor Rahavard, who created a uniquely well-stocked library of over 8000 books during the course of a 70 year period. In the film, old students, friends and colleagues recall the collection.

'South of Iran' is a documentary series showing Southern Iranian music, while explaining how it was influenced by various cultures throughout history and exploring how its instruments developed. This episode explores Mashayekh music, which is played during special ceremonies that are held by people from the coastal regions of South Iran. The ceremony aims to pacify a sort of 'harmful wind' which their beliefs associate with spirit possession, and the music involves playing a specific drumbeat in order to do this. Fascinating insight into regional rituals and beliefs.

"South of Iran" is a documentary series showing Southern Iranian music, while explaining how it was influenced by various cultures throughout history. This final episode explores Zar music, which is played during special ceremonies that are held specifically for the treatment of sick people. As the patient listens to the music, constantly moving their body to the rhythm, it is believed the combined effects of music, movement and lyrics will ease their pain. Alongside footage of Zar music in action, this film also provides a history of its tradition.

Content_1: «سهراب» نویسنده جوان کرمانی در تدارکی تألیف کتابی درباره تاریخ شعر کهن ایران و مکاتب مربوط به پنج شاعر نامی ایران، سعدی، مولوی، حافظ، خیام و فردوسی است... او برای دریافت مجوز چاپ کتابش در سفری به تهران، در کویر گم می شود و بر سر یک پنج راهی قرار میگیرد و نمیداند کدام راه را انتخاب کند؛ دمی خوشی بودن خیام را پیشه کند و یا عاقبت اندیشی سعدی را، یا... هرکدام از این پنج شاعر، بر او ظاهر می شوند و هرکدام درسی و حکمتی را به او می آموزند. سرانجام، نویسنده از طریق قنات های خشک کویر از متروی تهران سر در می آورد در حالی که دیگر از شعرا وشعرهایشان جز خاطره ای باقی نمانده است.
Content_2: 'Iran Is My Land' documents the journey of Sohrab, an itinerant writer, whose latest work, a book of Iranian poetry, requires a permit from Iran's censors in order to be published. Sohrab thus sets off on the road to Tehran in pursuit of this elusive document. As he ventures deeper into nature and immerses himself in his work, he encounters Persian poets from times long past, including the form of Saadi Shirazi, who provide comfort and guidance along his journey of inspiration.Sohrab is a young writer from Kerman. He has been writing a book on the history of classic Persian poetry and the styles of the five famous poets. He comes to Tehran for getting publishing permissions for his book. He gets lost in a desert.

Content_1: شیرهای جوان، داستان زندگی صدرا ورزشکار رشته کاراته است. صدرا دانشجو است و قبل از شرکت در مسابقات جهانی کیف، همراه خانواده اش به خانه نامزدش لیلا می رود. پدر لیلا عقیده دارد كه برای شروع یك زندگی مشترک، داشتن پول و ثروت مهم است.  صدرا فاطمی كه دانشجوست، همراه تیم ملی كاراته ایران برای یك مسابقه جهانی به شهر كیف، مركز اوكراین می رود. او پیش از مسافرت همراه خانواده اش به خانه نامزدش لیلا می رود. آقای خوشمرام، پدر لیلا عقیده دارد كه برای شروع یك زندگی مشترك، داشتن پول و ثروت مهم است.

از صمیم قلب، داستان دکتر قادری است که با ثریا ازدواج می کند. دنیا همسایه مهرداد و همبازی دوران کودکی او از این ازدواج ناراحت است. ثریا خبرنگار است و برای تهیه خبر باید به بوسنی هرزگوین برود. او راهی سفر می شود ولی...

در روستایی دور افتاده، معلم مدرسه پسر بچه ای را كه شیشه ای شكسته از كلاس بیرون می كند و به او تأكید می كند كه تا شیشه ای جای آن نگذارد حق آمدن به كلاس را ندارد. در این روستا شیشه بری وجود ندارد. پسرك باید راهی طولانی را برای انداختن شیشه بپیماید.
Content_2: A young school boy was ordered to walk a long way to purchase a piece of window glass larger than he could carry back to his school. The weather was bitter and the wind so strong that he almost failed on the road. He tried hard and finally moved the load back to the classroom where he was supposed to fix up a broken window. He was all alone and no one to turn for help. The glass blew crushed in pieces by the wind.

Content_1: پس از پایان جنگ، محبوبه، دختری که خانواده اش را در جنگ از دست داده، پس از مدت ها به خانه پدری اش که اکنون ویرانه است، باز میگردد. قصد محبوبه سر و سامان دادن به خانه و زندگی اش در آنجا است. امّا مردی تندخو به نام داود، که از پایان جنگ تاکنون، مشغول مین روبی از زمینهای منطقه است، به محبوبه برای برگشتن زودتر از موعد، پرخاش میکند. از نظرداود منطقه هنوز قابل سکونت نیست. اما محبوبه علی رغم هشدارهای وی، قصد دارد که در آنجا بماند... در خانه پدری محبوبه، که هنوز مورد بررسی داوود قرار نگرفته، تانکی زیر آوار پیدا می شود و محبوبه تصمیم میگیرد تا آن را بفروشد... محبوبه سپس به گورستان تانکی در نزدیکی خانه اش میرود و به نگهبان آنجا، که مردی افغانی به نام جمعه است، پیشنهاد فروش تانک را می دهد. برخوردهای آن سه با هم، سرانجام منتهی به یک احساس مشترک برای داود و جمعه می شود، آن دو دلبسته محبوبه شده اند، رقابت بین آن دو به مقابله بین شان تبدیل میشود که محبوبه پیش از کشته شدن یکی از آن دو، مانع ادامه اش میگردد. محبوبه به خواستگاری جمعه پاسخ مثبت میدهد، و جمعه تصمیم میگیرد تا خواسته محبوبه را عملی کرده و تانک را به عراقیها بفروشد ولی پیش از آن، تانک را به عنوان مرکب عروس تزیین می کنند و درست زمانی که محبوبه و جمعه قصد دارند به اتفاق برای ثبت ازدواج شان وفروختن تانک حرکت کنند، داود سر میرسد. و مانع آنها می شود. جمعه با داود درگیر شده و در نهایت تانک بدون راننده در مسیر حرکتش به آشیانه داود برخورد می کند و ناگهان چشمه ای از زمین میجوشد، چشمه ای که داود ادعا می کرد در آن محل وجود داشته ولی خشک شده، ولی محبوبه هرگز آن را باور نکرده بود. آیا این پایان درگیری آنها و آغاز زندگی تازه است...
Content_2: A man and a woman fight over the rights to a property.Mahboubeh is a lonely girl who has lost her family in the war. After the war ends she visits her dad’s house which now is nothing but ruins and wreckage. She wants to repair and restore everything but Davoud, a grumpy man who is busy demining the area shouts at her to leave because he believes the area is not fully cleared yet. In spite of Davoud’s words, Mahboubeh decides to stay. She finds a tank buried under the ruins in the house and decides to sell it so she walks into the tank graveyard nearby and talks to the Afghan guy named Jom’eh. After a while, Davoud and Jom’eh both develop feelings for Mahboubeh. In order to prevent further quarrels between them, she decides to marry Jom’eh and he in return helps her sell the tank to the Iraqis. But before that, they decorate the tank as their wedding vehicle. When Davoud tries to intervene he gets into a fight with Jom’eh and they totally forget about the moving tank, so it collapses with Davoud’s house and a stream of water springs out. Davoud had told about this stream of water to Mahboubeh before and had claimed that it was there a long time ago but had gone dry, but Mahboubeh never believed him. This may be the beginning of a new chapter for them…

Content_1: اوائل سال ۱۳۲۰، رضاشاه که در تنها سفر خارجی اش به ترکیه، دریافته چگونه آتاتورک به میزان نفوس کشورش آگاه است، پس دستور به سرشماری می دهد... شیوه سرشماری چنین است که همه باید در خانه ها بمانند تا با مراجعه مأموران سرشماری، کار درست پیش برود... عده ای از عوامل نظمیه از این خلوت و قرق شهر بهره میگیرند و یک جواهرفروشی در خیابان لاله زار را غارت میکنند، غافل از این که قطعه ای از جواهرات عروسی و خان مظفر در میان جواهرات به سرقت رفته است. خان مظفررئیس نظمیه را احضار می کند و بازگشت جواهر قیمتی عروس خود را در اسرع وقت، دستور می دهد، در این شرایط سرپاس نظمیه چاره کار را به مفتش شش انگشتی می سپارد... مفتش که کار خودش را خوب میداند، موفق به یافتن جواهر عروسی خان مظفر می گردد و بدین ترتیب مفتش شش انگشتی محبوب خان مظفر می شود... با اشغال طهران در شهریور ۱۳۲۰ شیرازه ی همه امور از هم می پاشد. تهران در اشغال ارتش متفقین در آمده و رضاشاه استعفا داده و از ایران خارج می شود و فروغی نخست وزیر، شاه جدید را برای به دست گرفتن امور به مجلس می برد. پادگان ها از سربازها خالی و شهر دچار اغتشاش می شود... در این شرایط آشفته، مفتش که تبدیل به آدم خاص خان ظفر شده، در مأموریتی ویژه به دستگیری مردی میرود که خان مظفر از جوانی به دنبال اوست تا در این زمانه پرآشوب، هم از هنرش بهره مند شود و هم حساب های گذشته اش را با او تسویه کند و این در حالی است که پیر خوشنویس هم به این باور رسیده است که شرایط مناسبی برای اوست تا انتقام دیرینه اش را از قدر قدرتی که جوانی او را تباه کرده است بگیرد...
Content_2: In the early 40's, after his first visit to Turkey, Reza Shah who was impressed by the fact that Ataturk knew the population of his country ordered a census. In order for the census to properly work out, everyone had to stay home while the agents came to visit. A few government agents used this opportunity and rubbed a jewelry store in Lale zar, unaware of the fact that a piece of Khane-Mozzafar's marriage jewelry is between the rubbed items.In the early 40's, after his first visit to Turkey, Reza Shah who was impressed by the fact that Ataturk knew the population of his country ordered a census. In order for the census to properly work out, everyone had to stay home while the agents came to visit. A few government agents used this opportunity and rubbed a jewelry store in Lale zar, unaware of the fact that a piece of Khane-Mozzafar's marriage jewelry is between the rubbed items. Khane-Mozzafar orders the sherrif to find and give back the piece of jewelry as soon as possible. The sherrif gives the job to the co-called 6-fingered detective. The detective is pretty good at his job and soon finds the jewelry and earns Khane-Mozzafar's respect and trust. The detective who now works for Khane-Mozzafar has a new mission to capture a man who the latter has been looking for for a long time. The khan wants to take revenge from the artist.

Content_1: آی ناز هفت خواستگار دارد. آتلان پدر آیناز اعلام می کند که پس از جشن گندم، خواستگاران او سوار بر اسب، هرکدام که بتواند زودتر از بقیه، روسری قرمزرنگ را از دست دخترش بگیرد، همسر او خواهد شد. تایماز، عاشق ترین خواستگار او، در رقابتی تنگاتنگ، همه رقیبان را پشت سر میگذارد. اما آریاچی پسرخاله آیناز، نزدیک ترین رقیب تایماز، از این امر به شدت ناراحت شده و کینه تایماز را به دل میگیرد و سرانجام در شب عروسی اش، او را مورد اصابت گلوله قرار میدهد. در همین حال، عوامل حکومتی برای تصاحب زمینهای ترکمنها تلاش می کنند و در عین حال با پراکندن شایعات، قصد ایجاد تفرقه دارند، از جمله شایع میکنند که تایماز قاتل عموی آتلان است که به تازگی به طرز مرموزی به قتل رسیده است. و آتلان، خشمگین از این امر، قصد کشتن دامادش را می کند اما بعد از رفع این غائله، تفنگچی های حکومت که از دسیسه ها و فتنه پراکنی هایشان نتیجه نگرفته اند، در یورشی بی رحمانه بسیاری از ترکمن ها را کشته و چادرهایشان را به آتش می کشند. تایماز به تنهایی با تفنگش به شهر رفته و مسببان اصلی کشتار، ترکمنها را به هلاکت می رساند
Content_2: Aynaz, the daughter of Atlan, has seven suitors. Atlan announces that every single one of them can marry her if he manages to win her red scarf in a horse race. Taymaz, a suitor who loves her the most, wins the race. Ariachi, Aynaz's nephew, becomes jelous of Taymaz and finally shoots him at the night of his wedding. In the meantime, government agents are trying to divide and take away the lands belonging to Turkmens by spreading rumors about Taymaz killing Atlan's uncle. Atlan then loses his heat and turns to kill Taymaz, but he realizes that he was deceived. Agents who couldn't make their plan work, attack Turkmens and slaughter many of them and burn their tents. We will witness Taymaz going to the city to avenge the death of the Turkmens by killing anyone involved in the slaughter.

Content_1: یاسمن پس از جدایی از همسر خود محمود به خارج از کشور می رود او بعد از شنیدن خبر درگذشت پدر خود به ایران آمده و مجدداً محمود را ملاقات می کند…
Content_2: Four years after breaking up, Mahmood meets Yasaman on the day of her father’s funeral, just after the latter has returned back from abroad. Mahmood has met Mina a year after his and Yasaman’s break-up. They are married and live a peaceful life together. But with Yasaman’s return, Mahmood's life faces some ups and downs.

Content_1: دختر جوانی به نام «ستاره » وارد عمارت یكی از شاهزادگان قاجار شده و به عنوان پرستار خصوصی پسر معلول این شاهزاده مشغول به كار می شود. طولی نمی كشد كه شاهزاده پیر و خواجه خانه مجذوب «ستاره » می شوند.
Content_2: Setareh Asadi is hired fto be a nurse for a Qajar Prince’s physically disabled son.

Content_1: امیر، با دو تن از دوستانش نوید و عظیم ؛ بعد از اینکه در سرقت اتومبیل دختر جوانی به نام الهام، موفق نمی شوند، کیف او را که حاوی گذرنامه وی، یک فیلمنامه و یک تلفن همراه است با خود میبرند و وقتی الهام از طریق تلفن همراه خود، با آنها تماس میگیرد، برای برگرداندن کیف و محتویاتش تقاضای دو میلیون تومان میکنند... مقارن با این اتفاقی، مردی به نام «شهاب» که توزیع کننده ی مواد مخدر است به جهت اختلافاتش با امیر با صحنه سازی ترتیبی میدهد تا امیر گرفتار مأموران و سرانجام زندان شود. «امیر» که میداند دوستانش «نوید» و «عظیم» در توزیع مواد مخدر با شهاب همکاری دارند، مع هذا آنها را لو نمی دهد... امیر با ضمانت الهام که به دنبال به دست آوردن فیلمنامه اش چندبار به دیدار او به زندان رفته است، آزاد میشود و پدر الهام، که متوجه صداقت و روحیه فداکارانه او شده، امکاناتی را در اختیارش می گذارد تا او بتواند رستورانی را اداره کند و کاملاً از کارهای خلاف دور شود... اما شهاب که کینه او را به دل دارد، شرایط پیچیده ای را برای امیر و دوستانش، ضمن طراحی توطئه هایی، موجب می شود امیر با دقت و هوشیاری و جدیت سعی میکند تا زندگی سلامت و ساده اش را ادامه دهد و در برابر تحریکات تبهکارانه شهاب مقاومت کرده و بدین ترتیب رضایت کامل پدرالهام را که ابتدا موافق ازدواج دخترش با او نبوده، جلب میکند...
Content_2: Ali, alongside his friends Navid and Azim, tries to steal the car of a young girl named Elham. But they don't succeed; instead, they steal a bag which contains her passport, a screenplay, and a mobile phone. When Elham makes contact with them through her mobile phone, they demand two million tumans in return for her documents.Ali, alongside his friends Navid and Azim, tries to steal the car of a young girl named Elham. But they don't succeed; instead, they steal a bag which contains her passport, a screenplay, and a mobile phone. When Elham makes contact with them through her mobile phone, they demand two million tumans in return for her documents. Meanwhile, Shahab, who is a drug dealer, because of his disagreements with Amir, lays a trap for him; Amir is arrested and imprisoned. Amir knows that his friends Navid and Azim work with Shahab; nevertheless, he doesn't tell anything about this to the police. Elham visits Amir in the prison to get her screenplay back and she bails him out. Elham's father who notices Amir's honesty and his selflessness offers him a managing job at a restaurant to keep him away from drugs and wrongdoing. But Shahab, who holds a grudge against Amir keeps plotting against him and his friends; but Amir responds to the new challenges and doesn't fall prey to his schemes. Elham's father, after seeing his endeavours, finally consents to their marriage.

EN_title: Smell of Camphor, Fragrance of Jasmine
Content_1: فیلم روایت کارگردان قدیمی است که بیست سال است فیلمی نساخته است اما تصمیم می گیرد به سفارش تلویزیون ژاپن فیلمی درباره مراسم تدفین خودش و رسم و رسومات مرگ و عزاداری در ایران بسازد.
Content_2: Iranian filmmaker Bahman Farmanara wrote, directed, and stars in this autobiographical drama of an artist reaching beyond the limits of censorship

Content_1: رنجر مرتضی، رزمنده ایرانی، در پی یک درگیری شدید با نیروهای عراقی در جنگلی واقع در عراق، به اسارت آنها درمی آید
Content_2: After an intense battle in an Iraqi forest, Iranian soldier Morteza surrenders to the enemy. Dubious about the quality of care he will receive from his captors, his worst fears are realised when the commander of the Iraqi battalion, Sami Jaber, orders for him to be transferred to a deserted camp, one not listed under the supervision of the Red Cross. Kept in terrible conditions, faced on all sides by the cruelty of men, Morteza struggles not to lose track of who he is and what he is fighting for.

Content_1: دکتر هادی بارانی تلاش می کند با تحقیقات خود داروی ضد سرطان بسازد. او همچنین مشکلات خانوادگی زیادی دارد.حاصل سال ها تحقیق و آزمایش مستمر دکتر هادی بارانی در درمان سرطان با کمک داروهای گیاهی، موجب مراجعه بیماران کثیری به او شده است. دکتر آهی از معدود همکاران اوست که موافق و همراهش است، برخلاف دکتر حکاکی ریاست بیمارستان - که به عنوان شاخص ترین مخالفش و کسی که سالها قبل نیز موجب اخراج بارانی به دلیل فعالیت های سیاسی اش، از دانشگاه شده بود - همچنان به طور مستمر به دسيسه عليه او مشغول است... دکتر بارانی در محدوده خانواده نیز مشکلاتی دارد. پسرش امید و دخترش آرزو، در ایجاد رابطه عاطفی با او دچار مشکل هستند، به همین جهت خانواده را ترک کرده اند. پروین همسرش نیز رابطه گرمی با او ندارد و معتقد است که بارانی به دلیل مشغله کاری اش قادر به سر و سامان دادن به زندگی خانوادگی اش نیست... در چنین شرایطی، زیبا رازی از دانشجویان سابق دکتر، پس از اخذ تخصص در رشته ی سرطان شناسی از انستیتوی میشیگان، به تهران بازگشته و با ابراز تمایل در پی گیری تحقیقات دکتر بارانی، با او همراه می شود... بارانی، که سالها پیش نیز دلباخته ی زیبا بوده، در ملاقاتهای مرتبی که با او دارد به نوعی دچار بحران عاطفی شده و زندگی و حرفه اش به مخاطره می افتد، و موقعیت خانوادگی اش نیز روز به روز بحرانی تر می شود. در چنین گردابی، با تدبیر دکتر آهی و همکاری زیبا، وانمود می شود که زیبا و دکتر آهی قصد ازدواج با هم را دارند و بدین ترتیب شرایطی را موجب شوند تا دکتر بارانی بتواند، با تصمیمی قاطع، بار دیگر توجه اش را معطوف ادامه فعالیت های تحقیقاتی و همچنین خانواده خود بسازد...
Content_2: After years of trying to find a herbal cure for cancer, Dr Hadi Barani has a reputation for being more of a madman than a doctor. When old flame Ziba returns to his life after 18 years, however, she brings with her memories of a friend whose life he couldn't save - and new hopes for his research. But with complications in his family life, and a conspiracy being plotted against him, what will Ziba's return mean for Hadi in the end?"Hadi Barani" is an experienced doctor with years of continuous research and testing on the treatment of cancer using herbal medicines. He has attratcted many parients.He has many family issues too.

Content_1: متولد ماه مهر، داستان مهتاب دختر دانشجویی است که قرار است با دانیال همکلاسی خود ازدواج کند. او ماجرا را به مادرش می گوید و از او می خواهد که جریان را به پدرش اطلاع دهد. دانیال از دانشجویان معترض به جداسازی دختران از پسران در دانشگاه است.مهتاب و دانیال دانشجوهای رشته جامعه شناسی، یکدیگر را دوست دارند، اما مسأله جداسازی دختران از پسران در دانشگاه و بیانیه ی موافقان این طرح که نام دانیال نیز ذیل آن هست، سوء تفاهم هایی را بین او و مهتاب پیش می آورد. امضای دانیال در ذیل بیانیه جعلی است و دانیال نیز به همین جهت با کسانی که در تدارک این بیانیه بوده و نام او را هم قید کرده اند، درگیر میشود. در همین زمان دوستان مهتاب از او میخواهند تا از نفوذ پدرش که از اعضای هیأت دانشگاه است در رد طرح اخیر استفاده کند. اما رئیس دانشگاه که از موافقان جدی این طرح است، به هر ترتیب آن را به تصویب می رساند. دانشجویان مخالف، تظاهراتی به پا میکنند و در جریان این حضور، دوستان مهتاب که از امضای دانیال زیر بیانیه ناراحت هستند و از پیگیری و مخالفت او نیز با این امر اطلاعی ندارند، نامه ای جعلی را که از طرف دانیال به مهتاب نوشته شده، دست به دست می گردانند که این موجب برخورد سختی بین پدر مهتاب و دانیال می شود و نهایتاً به اخراج دانیال از دانشگاه منتهی می شود. پس از این واقعه، دانیال به زادگاهش اندیمشک میرود. مهتاب که واقعاً دانیال را دوست دارد، به او ملحق می شود. اما زمانی که دانیال برای بازگشت مهتاب قصد دارد او را با موتورسیکلت به ایستگاه راه آهن ببرد براثر بارش بارانی سخت در انتخاب مسیر دچار اشتباه شده و آنها در منطقه ای مین گذاری شده، گرفتار می شوند، براثر انفجار یک نارنجک، دانیال میمیرد و مهتاب نیمی از پلاکی که بر گردن اوست، با خود میبرد...
Content_2: A young Iranian couple find it all but impossible to reconcile their love with the strict moral and religious strictures that govern their lives in this controversial drama. A powerful film about politics, religion and love.Mahtab and Danial are both studying sociology in college and are in love with each other. They are from two different social classes. After many tensions,They come to a deeper level of undrastanding .

Content_1: زنی در مواجهه با یك اتفاق بزرگ در زندگی اش، در دو راهه تصمیم قرار می گیرد، او یا باید مطابق عرف دست به انتخاب بزند و یا...نیروی انتظامی دختر شانزده ساله ای به نام تداعی را با پسر جوانی به نام آیدین در پارک دستگیر می کند. در پاسگاه پدر و مادر تداعی ، از آیدین با شکایت می کنند و در یی شکایت، نیروی انتظامی تداعی را به پزشکی قانونی میفرستد . تداعی که از نحوه رفتار والدینش دلگیر شده ، روز بعد، از رفتن به مدرسه خودداری کرده و در خیابانها پرسه میزند و بعد از فروش طلاهایش با آیدین تماس میگیرد تا باهم فرار کنند. امّا آیدین با پدرش بیرون از شهر رفته و تأ شب هم برنمیگردد. تداعی با دوستان و معلم سابق خود تماس میگیرد تا از آنها راهنمایی بخواهد، اما آنها هیچ یک موقعیت او را درک نمیکنند.  تداعی با مرد میانه سالی در خیابان آشنا میشود و او به نصیحت تداعی میپردازد، اما خودش به تداعی سونیت دارد. بعد از این اتفاق ، تداعی سرخورده و پریشان با زن کولی به نام مهیاره و پسرش آشنا می شود و با آنها به خانه شان در یک حلبی آباد می رود، در آنجا، چند مرد قصد تعرض به او را میکنند، امّا مهیاره و پسرش او را از مهلکه نجات میدهند... مهیاره برای کمک به تداعی ، از آشنایش یوسف میخواهد تا به هر ترتیب، آیدین را به پارک بیاورد. یوسف این کار را می کند، اما رفتار او بعد از نصیحتهای پدرش نسبت به گذشته، به کلی با تداعی تغییر کرده و تأکید میکند که دیگر قصد ازدواج با تداعی را ندارد... تداعی، سرخورده آیدین را ترک کرده و به خانه باز میگردد...
Content_2: A somewhat cynical take on Shakespeare's Romeo and Juliet, this film's romantic plot focuses on the troubles surrounding a young couple in love. Infatuated with teenage boy Aideen, Tadaei heads for school as usual one morning, but decides not to go after all. Instead, she roams the streets of Tehran over a 24 hour period. She makes up her mind not to return to home and run away with Aideen, much to the outrage of her parents, who are horrified at the idea of Tadaei being caught alone with a young man. Harangued by the police, Tadaei’s experiences make her change her mentality of love, and inevitably her pathway.The police arrest a sixteen years old girl, named Tadai, and a young boy, named Aideen, in a park. Tadai’s parents come to the police station and complain of Aideen. Following their lawsuit against Aideen, the police send the girl to be examined by forensic experts. The next day, Tadai, while being mad at her parents, does not attend school and roams in the streets. After selling her jewelries, Tadai calls Aideen to escape together. However, Aideen is with his father and they have gone out of the city; they won’t be back till the night. Then, Tadai calls her friends and her former teacher. She seeks their advice; however, none of them understand her situation. In the street, Tadai meets a middle-aged man. The man advises Tadai; although, he himself has some evil intentions towards her as well. Passing through such events, Tadai is disappointed and distressed. She runs into a gypsy woman, named Mahyareh, and her son. And they take Tadai with themselves to their house in the slums. There, some men are after raping her, but, Mahyareh and her son save her from that perilous situation. In order to help Tadai, Mahyareh asks a person, named Yousef, whom she knows, to bring Aideen to the park at any possible way. Yousef does what he has been asked to do. Nevertheless, affected by his father’s advice, Aideen treats differently towards Tadai. Moreover, he emphasizes that he does not wish to marry Tadai anymore. Tadai, despaired and broken, leaves Aideen and returns home...

Content_1: شیدا فاطمی (لیلا حاتمی) و مادرش به یک مراسم عروسی می روند. شیدا در حال بهت و ناباوری است. در محل برگزاری مراسم، شیدا با شنیدن نام داماد (فرهاد- پارسا پیروزفر) بی اختیار خود را روی صندلی رها می کند. دوربین طی چند فلش بک به گذشته ماجرا را روایت می کند....فرهاد که در جنگ مجروح شده، موقتاً بینایی اش را از دست داده و به بیمارستان صحرایی منتقل می شود که در آن پرستاری به نام شیدا خدمت می کند.شیدا، از مشاهده مقاومت فرهاد در تحمل دردی که دارد، شگفت زده است، او وقتی آیات قرآن مجید را تلاوت می کند، احساس می کند که فرهاد از شنیدن آن موقعیت روحیه بهتری پیدا می کند. مراقبت های شیدا رفته رفته، رابطه ای عاطفی بینشان پدید می آورد. اما با مرخص شدن فرهاد بین آن دو فاصله می افتد، فرهاد بعداً در جست و جوی شیدا به جبهه برمیگردد، اما جنگ به پایان رسیده و بیمارستان صحرایی نیز تعطیل شده است... در حالی که فرهاد همه جا را در جست وجوی شیدا، زیرپا میگذارد، والدینش به اصرار او را ناچار به ازدواج با دختر متمولی می کنند که سودای مهاجرت به کانادا را دارد... کمی بعد ترکشی که در سینه فرهاد است، سلامت او را به خطر می اندازد، لذا او را در بیمارستان بستری می کنند، بیمارستانی که شیدا نیز به عنوان پرستار در آن مشغول کار است... ظاهراً امیدی به بازگشت فرهاده به زندگی نیست. نامزدش او را ترک می کند، اما شیدا به زندگی او امیدواراست، او یک بار دیگر با خواندن قرآن و به مدد نیروی عشق موفق میشود تا فرهاد را به زندگی برگرداند...
Content_2: Farhad has lost his eyesight due to an injury sustained in battle. As part of his recovery, he is transferred to a temporary hospital, where he encounters young nurse Sheida. Sheida is surprised by his tolerance to the pain of his injury, but soon realises that her recitation of Quran verses has a miraculous calming effect on him. And as the two start to grow closer and Farhad begins to heal, they find themselves on the path between faith and hope, and the true nature of both is revealed to them.  Synopsis by IMVbox.comFarhad is wounded during the war and has temporarily lost his vision. He is transferred to a field hospital where a young girl named Sheida is a nurse. Sheida is astonished seeing how Farhad puts up with the pain and she sees that he seems to feel better when he hears her reciting the Quran. Her care gradually builds up affection between them but they lost thier contact after he is discharged. Farhad returns later looking for Sheida but the war has ended and the field hospital is gone... While he is still looking everywhere for her, his parents want him to marry a wealthy girl who wants to immigrate to Canada... Some time later, the shrapnel shell in Farhad's chest threatens his health and he is taken to a hospital where Sheida works... There seems to be no hope left for Farhad to stay alive and his fiance leaves him. But Sheida is still hopeful and manages to return him to life once again by reciting the Quran to him...

Content_1: نسیم كه حالا زن جاافتاده ای است، خاطرات جوانی اش در سال های 1320 را مرور می كند.سال های دهه ی بیست، تهران .حسان کاملی مهندس پالایشگاه نفت آبادان که جهت استراحت و گذراندن تعطیلات، نزد همسرش نسیم آمده است ، مورد هجوم مأمور امنیتی قرار گرفته و دستگیر می شود. نسیم که باردار است براثر ضربه مشت یکی از مأموران به شدت مصدوم شده و سقط جنین می کند. این برای او که پس از پانزده سال میخواسته فرزندش را به دنیا آورده بسیار دردناک است، اما در عین حال او مترصد احوال شوهرش و نگران اوست و با واسطه کردن دوست مشترک خانوادگی شان دکتر معارف، به نظمیه می رود و تیمسار فرمانده، پس از بررسی پرونده ی احسان به نسیم میگوید که شوهرش پرونده قطوری چه از زمان تحصیل و چه در زمان کار در شرکت نفت دارد و از فعالین و مشوقین اعتصاب کارکنان پالایشگاه بوده است... و نهایتاً نسیم درمی یابد که احسان به پاسگاه دورافتاده ای در کویر تبعید شده است. احسان در تبعید، به زودی با مأموران مراقبت خود، از جمله فرمانده پاسگاه، استوار سمیع، دوست می شود و وقتی پاسگاه مورد حمله عده ای مسلح قرار میگیرد، استوار از او میخواهد که جان خود را نجات دهد، امّا استوار در اثنا دفاع کشته شده و احسان نیز اسیر می شود. احسان ، در یک فرصت از بند مهاجمان می گریزد و با تحمل مشقاتی سرانجام خود را به تهران و خانه و نزد همسرش می رساند، اما دیری نمیگذرد که بار دیگراحسان و این نوبت به اتهام تازه ی، سامان دادن فعالیتهای ضد دولتی،دستگیر میشود. این بار برگشتی برای احسان ها در کار نیست چه پس از مدتها رد گیری، سرانجام نسیم درمی یابد که همسرش کشته شده است.
Content_2: Shortly after the fall of the Shah, an old woman, Nasim, recollects memories from her youth. From the joyful visit of her nephew, Alireza, to the fight for her husband's freedom, she remembers the loss and the tragedies of her past. She relives each painful memory, from a time when she still believed the world would become a better place. A heartbreaking look at one woman's sense of loss.During mid-1940s to mid-1950s in Tehran, Ehsan Kameli who is an engineer at Abadan oil refinery comes to his wife Nasim on holidays but is attacked by security guards and arrested. Nasim who is pregnant, is punched by a security guard and her baby is aborted. This is a tragedy for her since she has waited for fifteen years to have a child. She is also concerned about her husband and asks for his conditions. She goes to the police station through a middleman called Mr. Ma'ref, and after investigating the case for her husband, the commander tells her that his case is a big one from his university years to the oil company and he was an activist and took part in workers' strikes. She finally finds out that her husband is exiled to a remote police station in desert. Ehsan becomes friend with officers there, particularly the chief warrant officer Sami', and when the station is attacked by a group of armed criminals, the chief asked him to escape and save his life, but the chief is killed and Ehsan is captured. He escapes from prison, and suffering lots of difficulties, goes to Tehran to see his wife. But after a while, he is arrested again for anti-government activities. There is no return this time and after tracking him for some time, Nasim eventually finds out that her husband is killed.

Content_1: لوکوموتیوران پیر جنوبی با شروع جنگ مجبور به ترک شهر می شود اما امید پسرش و تازه دامادش در شهر می مانند و به دفاع در مقابل دشمن می پردازند. و تنها یک بار به دیدن خانواده می آیند و دیگر خبری از آن ها نمی شود و...
Content_2: Captivating wartime drama about a locomotive driver who is forced to flee to south Iran to escape the war raging around him. In doing so, he loses contact with his son who stays behind to defend the city. Years later the train driver and his family hope for the son's return. As time passes with no sign of the son, the family must instead look to each other for comfort and security.
